612020.name: Path Resonance: Preservation
612020.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.

612021.name: Resonance Formation: Zero-Dimensional Reinforcement
612021.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

612022.name: Resonance Formation: Eutectic Reaction
612022.desc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and Amber is applied to all allies at the same time.

612023.name: Resonance Formation: Isomorphous Reaction
612023.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 3% Energy.

612024.name: Resonance Interplay: Spiked Armor
612024.desc: There is a 150% base chance for Path Resonance: Preservation to inflict Bleed on the attacked target for 2 turn(s). Bleeding enemies will take Physical DoT equal to 12% of their Max HP at the start of each turn. This DMG cannot exceed 250% of the total amount of Shield Effect currently active on all allies.

612025.name: Resonance Interplay: Cold Snap
612025.desc: When attacking Frozen enemy targets with Path Resonance: Preservation, the DMG dealt increases by 80% and the Freeze status on the enemy targets is removed. Dissociation will not be removed by this effect.

612026.name: Resonance Interplay: Reverse Quenching
612026.desc: When using Path Resonance, extends Shield duration by 2 turn(s) on characters whose current HP is below 50% of their Max HP. For every character on which this takes effect, this current use of the Path Resonance deals 20% more DMG.

612027.name: Resonance Interplay: Displaced Ascent
612027.desc: Using the Ultimate increases the next Path Resonance's Physical RES PEN by 8%, stacking up to 8 time(s).

612030.name: Divine Construct: Resonance Transfer
612030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
612030.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield Effect plus 20% of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.

612031.name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field
612031.desc: After a character is attacked, deals Quake DMG to the attacker, equal to 340% of the character's current Shield Effect. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.enhanced_desc: After a character is attacked, deals Quake DMG to the attacker, equal to 420% of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

612032.name: Divine Construct: Macrosegregation
612032.desc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 1% of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen in equal value. For every 2 turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.enhanced_desc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 10% of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen by 130%. For every 2 turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.

612040.name: Interstellar Construct: Shear Structure
612040.desc: Characters deal 10% increased Quake DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take Quake DMG equal to 25% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
612040.enhanced_desc: Characters deal 15% increased Quake DMG to their target, and other targets also take Quake DMG equal to 30% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.

612041.name: Interstellar Construct: Burst Lattice
612041.desc: When a character deals Quake DMG to an enemy target, there is a 65% base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.enhanced_desc: When a character deals Quake DMG to an enemy target, there is a 100% base chance to cause the target to Bleed.

612042.name: Interstellar Construct: Solid Solution
612042.desc: Deals increased Quake DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 80% of the character's current DEF.
612042.enhanced_desc: Deals increased Quake DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 120% of the character's current DEF.

612043.name: Interstellar Construct: Safe Load
612043.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 40% of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of 120% of their Base ATK.
612043.enhanced_desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 60% of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of 160% of their Base ATK.

612044.name: Interstellar Construct: Sanctuary
612044.desc: At the end of the turn, there is 80% fixed chance for characters to gain a Shield equal to 12% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).
612044.enhanced_desc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 15% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).

612045.name: Interstellar Construct: Quadrangular Pyramid
612045.desc: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by 30%.
612045.enhanced_desc: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by 35%.

612046.name: Interstellar Construct: Hypoeutectoid
612046.desc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 24% of the provided Shield for 2 turn(s).
612046.enhanced_desc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 36% of the provided Shield for 2 turn(s).

612050.name: Construct: Assemble
612050.desc: Characters gain a 6% DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of 6 time(s).
612050.enhanced_desc: Characters gain a 8% DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of 9 time(s).

612051.name: Construct: Sentinel
612051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 16% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612051.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 24% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612052.name: Construct: Patch
612052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 1 turn(s).
612052.enhanced_desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612053.name: Construct: Compensation
612053.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 14% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612053.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

612055.name: Construct: Rotation
612055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 20% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.enhanced_desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 30% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.

612056.name: Construct: Burst
612056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 30%.
612056.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 45%.

612057.name: Construct: Concentration
612057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 16%.
612057.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 24%.

612120.name: Path Resonance: Remembrance
612120.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a 120% base chance to Freeze all enemies for 1 turn(s).

612121.name: Resonance Formation: Total Recall
612121.desc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a 150% base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by 100% for 1 turn(s).

612122.name: Resonance Formation: Rich Experience
612122.desc: When using Path Resonance, there is a 150% base chance to apply Eonian River to all enemies for 1 turn.

612123.name: Resonance Formation: First Love Once More
612123.desc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.

612124.name: Resonance Interplay: Faces Places
612124.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a 150% base chance of lowering the target's All-Type RES by 15% for 2 turn(s). For every 1% HP that each ally has lost, the target's All-Type RES is additionally lowered by 0.06%.

612125.name: Resonance Interplay: Landscape in the Mist
612125.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a 150% base chance of decreasing the target's SPD by 15% for 2 turn(s).

612126.name: Resonance Interplay: Roar and Rustle
612126.desc: When the Freeze effect from the Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, characters gain a Shield equal in strength to 40% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once by each use of the Path Resonance.

612127.name: Resonance Interplay: Seemingly Mirrored
612127.desc: Basic ATKs against enemies Frozen by the Path Resonance have a 100% base chance to inflict Dissociation on them for 1 turn(s).

612130.name: Perfect Experience: Fuli
612130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Dissociation for 1 turn(s).
612130.enhanced_desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation to the enemy for 1 turn(s). DMG dealt when Dissociation is removed +20%.

612131.name: Perfect Experience: Innocence
612131.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation on the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612131.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation on the enemy for 1 turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.

612132.name: Perfect Experience: Reticence
612132.desc: After an enemy is attacked 6 time(s), they have a 120% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
612132.enhanced_desc: After an enemy is attacked 5 time(s), they have a 150% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).

612140.name: Ultimate Experience: Melancholia
612140.desc: Attacking an enemy with Dissociation will remove Dissociation, and deal DMG equal to 150% of the Dissociation removal DMG.
612140.enhanced_desc: Attacking an enemy with Dissociation will remove Dissociation, and deal DMG equal to 200% of the Dissociation removal DMG.

612141.name: Ultimate Experience: Dizziness
612141.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with Dissociation by 36%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after Dissociation is removed.
612141.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with Dissociation by 54%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after Dissociation is removed.

612142.name: Ultimate Experience: Insensitivity
612142.desc: After Dissociation is removed from an enemy, there is a 50% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612142.enhanced_desc: After Dissociation is removed from an enemy, there is a 75% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

612143.name: Ultimate Experience: Sentimentality
612143.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, enemies adjacent to it also receive DMG equal to 20% of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.enhanced_desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, all other enemies also receive DMG equal to 24% of the DMG taken by the target enemy.

612144.name: Ultimate Experience: Indelibility
612144.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there's a 2.0% base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for 1 turn(s).
612144.enhanced_desc: Enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by 20%. When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there is a 2.5% base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for 1 turn(s).

612145.name: Ultimate Experience: Shudder
612145.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for 2 turn(s).
612145.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for 2 turn(s).

612146.name: Ultimate Experience: Maverick
612146.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
612146.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by 30%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

612150.name: Experience: Unspeakable Shame
612150.desc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by 6%, stacking up to 6 time(s).
612150.enhanced_desc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by 8%, stacking up to 9 time(s).

612151.name: Experience: The Torment of Alienation
612151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 16%.
612151.enhanced_desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 24%.

612152.name: Experience: Lost Memory
612152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 70% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
612152.enhanced_desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 100% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

612153.name: Experience: Stone Cold Hatred
612153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 36%.
612153.enhanced_desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 54%.

612154.name: Experience: Pain & Suffering
612154.desc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next 1 attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have 100% increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.enhanced_desc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next 2 attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have 100% increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.

612155.name: Experience: Primordial Hardship
612155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 16%.
612155.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 24%.

612156.name: Experience: Thrill of Escalation
612156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 8 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.enhanced_desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 12 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.

612157.name: Experience: Responsive Excitement
612157.desc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 16% of their Max HP for 3 turn(s).
612157.enhanced_desc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 24% of their Max HP for 3 turn(s).

612220.name: Path Resonance: Nihility
612220.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a 80% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for 2 turn(s).

612221.name: Resonance Formation: The Doubtful Fourfold Root
612221.desc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by 100% and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.

612222.name: Resonance Formation: Suffering and Sunshine
612222.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a 100% base chance to inflict 2 stacks of Confusion and 2 stacks of Devoid on all enemies for 2 turn(s).

612223.name: Resonance Formation: Outsider
612223.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 2% Energy.

612224.name: Resonance Interplay: Off the Beaten Track
612224.desc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions by 4%.

612225.name: Resonance Interplay: White Nights
612225.desc: A character's Basic ATK can cause all DoTs currently applied on the target via Path Resonance: Nihility to immediately deal DMG equivalent to 40% of these statuses' original DMG.

612226.name: Resonance Interplay: Reign of Keys
612226.desc: Path Resonance deals 30% more DMG to Frozen enemies. When enemy targets become Frozen, DoTs applied by the Path Resonance extend their duration by 1 turn(s).

612227.name: Resonance Interplay: Terror and Tremble
612227.desc: For each unique Type of non-DoT DMG the enemy target has taken, Path Resonance deals 6% more DMG to it, lasting until the end of the turn.

612230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
612230.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies 1 stack(s) of Suspicion.
612230.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy receives DoT, apply 1 stack(s) of Suspicion. Suspicion stacks will not be reduced.

612231.name: The Man in the Cover
612231.desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply 3 stack(s) of Suspicion.
612231.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply 3 stack(s) of Suspicion. Every time the DoT refreshes, apply 1 stack(s) of Suspicion.

612232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
612232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT 1 times, dealing DMG equal to 90% of the original DoT.
612232.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT 1 times, dealing DMG equal to 135% of the original DoT.

612240.name: Beginning and End
612240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with Suspicion is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of Suspicion the defeated enemy has on 1 random enemy target(s).
612240.enhanced_desc: When an enemy inflicted with Suspicion is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of Suspicion the defeated enemy has on 2 random enemy target(s).

612241.name: Café Self-Deceit
612241.desc: When an enemy has Suspicion on them, inflicts 1 extra stack(s) of Suspicion.
612241.enhanced_desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Suspicion, the stacks it gains are doubled.

612242.name: Call of the Wilderness
612242.desc: For every stack of Suspicion the enemies have, reduces their ATK by 0.3%, up to a max of 30%.
612242.enhanced_desc: For every stack of Suspicion the enemies have, reduces their ATK by 0.4%, up to a max of 30%, and reduces their Effect RES by 0.4%, up to a max of 30%.

612243.name: Night Beyond Pyre
612243.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by 30%.
612243.enhanced_desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by 45%.

612244.name: Hell is Other People
612244.desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to enemies adjacent to it.
612244.enhanced_desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to all enemies.

612245.name: Twilight of Existence
612245.desc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a 75% base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for 2 turn(s).
612245.enhanced_desc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a 75% base chance to inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for 2 turn(s), and dispels 1 debuff currently on the attacker.

612246.name: All Things are Possible
612246.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 100% of the DoT.
612246.enhanced_desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 150% of the DoT.

612250.name: Ignosticism
612250.desc: Gains a 6% DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612250.enhanced_desc: Gains a 8% DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 9 time(s).

612253.name: Tragic Lecture
612253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 10%.
612253.enhanced_desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 15%.

612254.name: Sensory Labyrinth
612254.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by 1 turn(s).
612254.enhanced_desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by 2 turn(s).

612255.name: Emotional Decluttering
612255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).
612255.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 4%. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

612256.name: Offerings of Deception
612256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.0% of their respective Max HP.
612256.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.5% of their respective Max HP.

612257.name: Before Sunrise
612257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, 2.0 Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, 3.0 Energy is regenerated for a random ally.

612320.name: Path Resonance: Abundance
612320.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by 50% of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by 15% for 2 turn(s).

612321.name: Resonance Formation: Terminal Nirvana
612321.desc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to 1 time(s) per battle.

612322.name: Resonance Formation: Anicca
612322.desc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies 1 stack(s) of Subduing Evils for 1 turn(s).

612323.name: Resonance Formation: Anatta
612323.desc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear in the Action Order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by 30%. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance 1 time to heal allies.

612324.name: Resonance Interplay: Mountain High
612324.desc: After a character has their HP restored via Path Resonance and if the healing amount exceeds the maximum HP, recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger 1 time per Path Resonance use. After triggering this effect, all DMG dealt by all allies is increased by 30% for 2 turns. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

612325.name: Resonance Interplay: Nullifying Ardor
612325.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 15% and Break Effect increases by 50%. This effect lasts for 2 turn(s) and stacks up to 2 time(s).

612326.name: Resonance Interplay: Fleeting Samadhi
612326.desc: For every 1% of healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP, the character deals 1% increased Ultimate DMG. This effect is stackable, up to a maximum of 100%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612327.name: Resonance Interplay: Destined Death
612327.desc: Healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP is stored and will be released as automatic healing when the character's HP falls below 35% of their Max HP. Up to 50% of the character's Max HP (when the Path Resonance is used) can be stored.

612330.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
612330.desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored.
612330.enhanced_desc: Charges "Dewdrop" when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored. Moreover, increases the DMG of "Dewdrop" by 40%.

612331.name: Mudra of Blessing
612331.desc: Charges "Dewdrop" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 60% of their current HP.
612331.enhanced_desc: Charges "Dewdrop" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 70% of their Max HP.

612332.name: All Abundance in One Mind
612332.desc: When a character provides healing, ally targets other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 30% of the HP restored.
612332.enhanced_desc: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also restore HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP restored. Increases the ATK of all allies by 15% of the amount of HP restored, stacking up to no more than 80% of each ally's respective Base ATK and lasts until the end of the next turn.

612340.name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
612340.desc: Restores HP to the character equal to 20% of the Charge value when "Dewdrop" ruptures, up to 18% of the character's Max HP.
612340.enhanced_desc: Restores HP equal to 20% of the Charge value when "Dewdrop" ruptures, up to 24% of the character's Max HP and no less than 12% of their Max HP.

612341.name: The Blessed Many
612341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "Dewdrop" by 80%.
612341.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "Dewdrop" by 120%.

612342.name: Salvation From Damnation
612342.desc: When a "Dewdrop" breaks, there is a 65% fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.
612342.enhanced_desc: When a "Dewdrop" breaks, there is a 100% fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.

612343.name: Candlelight Radiance
612343.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by 50% for 1 turn(s).
612343.enhanced_desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s).

612344.name: Bitter Is the Bane
612344.desc: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to 36% of their current HP.
612344.enhanced_desc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to 42% of the character's Max HP.

612345.name: Corporeal Pellucidity
612345.desc: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by 36%.
612345.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by 36%, and increases their Effect RES by 27%.

612346.name: Prajna Voyage
612346.desc: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP restored.
612346.enhanced_desc: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to 45% of the amount of HP restored.

612350.name: Dharma Rain
612350.desc: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by 5%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612350.enhanced_desc: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by 7%. This effect can stack up to a max of 9 time(s).

612352.name: Extended Life
612352.desc: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.
612352.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to 36% of their Max HP.

612353.name: Mudra
612353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 16% of their Max HP.
612353.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 24% of their Max HP.

612354.name: Peril Parry
612354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 24% for 1 turn(s).
612354.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 36% for 1 turn(s).

612355.name: Back to Life
612355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 12% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612355.enhanced_desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 18% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612356.name: Force Victoire
612356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 10% for 1 turn(s).
612356.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 15% for 1 turn(s).

612357.name: Empower
612357.desc: After a character provides healing, there is a 30% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612357.enhanced_desc: After a character provides healing, there is a 45% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612420.name: Path Resonance: The Hunt
612420.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies based on the current ATK of the character currently with the highest ATK.

612421.name: Resonance Formation: Star Hunter
612421.desc: When using Path Resonance, the ally with the highest ATK will be given a turn instantly and be granted Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow, lasting until this ally uses any ability.

612422.name: Resonance Formation: Bow and Arrow
612422.desc: When Path Resonance: The Hunt deals damage, enemies whose HP is lower than 50% are guaranteed to receive CRIT Hits, with the CRIT DMG at 50%. When the enemy is defeated, regenerates 50% Energy.

612423.name: Resonance Formation: Perfect Aim
612423.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. When an ally's turn starts, additionally regenerates 3% Energy for Path Resonance.

612424.name: Resonance Interplay: Startling Breeze
612424.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' SPD increases by 25 for 2 turn(s). This effect also applies to units summoned by allies.

612425.name: Resonance Interplay: Shooting Starfire
612425.desc: After enemy target(s) are defeated by a Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP equal to 50% of their respective Max HP.

612426.name: Resonance Interplay: Solemn Snare
612426.desc: For every Skill Point recovered by allies, the next Path Resonance deals 20% more DMG, stacking up to 8 time(s).

612427.name: Resonance Interplay: Waiting with Drawn Bow
612427.desc: When using Path Resonance, allies' Shield duration extends by 5 turn(s).

612430.name: Empyrean Imperium
612430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
612430.enhanced_desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost and increases the stack limit of Critical Boost to 12.

612431.name: Radiant Supreme
612431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
612431.enhanced_desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 7 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

612432.name: Sovereign Skybreaker
612432.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
612432.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 75%. If the Weakness Broken enemy is an Elite Enemy, then Action Advances for all allies.

612440.name: Skyward Vendetta
612440.desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 150%.
612440.enhanced_desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. For every stack of "Critical Boost," CRIT DMG increases by an extra 0.2%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 200%.

612441.name: Archery Duel
612441.desc: When a character's turn begins, every stack of Critical Boost restores the character's HP equal to 5% of their Max HP.
612441.enhanced_desc: When a character's turn begins, or after they used their Ultimate, restores the character's HP equal to 5% of their Max HP for every stack of Critical Boost.

612442.name: Adept's Bow
612442.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.
612442.enhanced_desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a Follow-up ATK, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.

612443.name: Mistwraith Pursuit
612443.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
612443.enhanced_desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 times and gives a 50% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.

612444.name: Starlit Hunt
612444.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to 60% of the character's Max Energy.
612444.enhanced_desc: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to 100% of the character's Max Energy.

612445.name: Borisin Chase
612445.desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
612445.enhanced_desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, 5 turn(s) are considered to have already passed.

612446.name: Rainbow Fang
612446.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores their HP equal to 48% of their Max HP.
612446.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP equal to 18% of their Max HP. When a character defeats an enemy, restores HP equal to 48% of their Max HP.

612450.name: Vermeil Bow and White Arrow
612450.desc: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by 3%. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612450.enhanced_desc: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by 4%. This effect can stack up to a max of 9 time(s).

612453.name: Thundering Chariot
612453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 20%.
612453.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 30%.

612454.name: Constellation Surge
612454.desc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by 30% until they are attacked.
612454.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by 45% until they are attacked.

612455.name: Astral Menace
612455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 8%.
612455.enhanced_desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 12%.

612456.name: Arboreal Volley
612456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.
612456.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 6 Energy.

612457.name: Arrow Shades Bow
612457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 10% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
612457.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 15% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.

612520.name: Path Resonance: Destruction
612520.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies based on the current HP difference between Max HP and current HP for all allies combined.

612521.name: Resonance Formation: Cataclysmic Variable
612521.desc: Using a Path Resonance will consume HP from all allies until their HP is equal to 40% of their respective Max HP, increasing the DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction by 20%. The amount of HP consumed will be converted into a Shield lasting for 2 turn(s), with the same Shield value as the HP lost.

612522.name: Resonance Formation: Extreme Helium Flash
612522.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a 150% base chance to inflict Entropic Retribution on the enemy target for 2 turn(s).

612523.name: Resonance Formation: Event Horizon
612523.desc: When an ally whose current HP percentage is below 35% gets attacked, automatically releases 1 Path Resonance without consuming Energy. This effect can be triggered up to a max of 2 time(s) in a single battle and cannot be triggered multiple times by the same attack.

612524.name: Resonance Interplay: Substellar Belt
612524.desc: Using Path Resonance will cause any character with current HP percentage lower than 50% to gain a Shield equal to 40% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612525.name: Resonance Interplay: Zero Age Main Sequence
612525.desc: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, regenerates 5% Energy for Path Resonance. If the character's current HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally regenerates 5% Energy for Path Resonance.

612526.name: Resonance Interplay: Nuclear Implosion
612526.desc: When using Path Resonance to attack, additionally deals a set amount of DMG to all enemy targets whose HP is below 20% of their Max HP, reducing these targets' HP to 1.

612527.name: Resonance Interplay: Protostar
612527.desc: After losing HP due to allies or Path Resonance effects, the characters gain Healing Over Time that lasts 2 turn(s). At the start of every turn, restore HP equal to 30% of the consumed HP.

612530.name: Non-Inverse Antimatter Equation
612530.desc: If a character's current HP percentage is below 50%, they are considered to have 16 extra stacks of Grit.
612530.enhanced_desc: If a character's current HP percentage is below 50%, they are considered to have 20 extra stacks of Grit. For every 10% further HP lost, gains 2 extra stack(s) of Grit.

612531.name: Universal Heat Death Characteristic
612531.desc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, they gain 4 stack(s) of Grit. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stack(s) of Grit.
612531.enhanced_desc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, the character gains 4 stacks of Grit, and adjacent allies gain 1 stacks of Grit. When the turn ends, the character loses 4 stacks of Grit.

612532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
612532.desc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
612532.enhanced_desc: Receives 15% less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.

612540.name: Incremental Doomsday
612540.desc: After being hit, for each stack of Grit the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 4% of their ATK to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.enhanced_desc: After being hit, for each stack of Grit the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 4% of their ATK plus 2% of the current HP loss to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.

612541.name: Catastrophic Resonance
612541.desc: If a character attacks while having Grit, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost.
612541.enhanced_desc: If a character attacks while having Grit, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost. For each stack of Grit, deals Additional DMG equal to 1% of the HP lost.

612542.name: Indicative Depth of Field
612542.desc: For each stack of Grit, reduces the DMG taken by the character by 0.8%.
612542.enhanced_desc: For each stack of Grit, reduces the DMG taken by characters by 0.8%. Grit can stack up to 45 time(s).

612543.name: Devastating Accretion
612543.desc: For every 1% of the difference between a character's Max HP and current HP, their ATK increases by 0.8%.
612543.enhanced_desc: For every 1% of a character's Max HP that is lost, their ATK increases by 0.8% and DEF by 0.5%.

612544.name: Destructive Flare
612544.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, deals 40% increased DMG.
612544.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, deals 50% increased DMG. When HP's lower than 35%, DMG dealt further increases by 20%.

612545.name: Disciplinary Flicker
612545.desc: If an ally target's current HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or consuming HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP. This can restore HP equal to a maximum of 36% Max HP during a single action.
612545.enhanced_desc: If an ally target's current HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or consuming HP, restores their HP by 20% of their Max HP. This can restore HP equal to a maximum of 50% Max HP during a single action.

612546.name: Hazardous Lucent Residue
612546.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 25% of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612546.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 25% of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, plus 7% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612550.name: Primordial Black Hole
612550.desc: Characters gain a 5% ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 6 time(s).
612550.enhanced_desc: Characters gain a 7% ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of 9 time(s).

612551.name: Reflection
612551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 1% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
612551.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 30% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.

612553.name: Instability Strip
612553.desc: When characters are hit or have lost HP, 4 Energy is regenerated.
612553.enhanced_desc: When characters are hit or have lost HP, 6 Energy is regenerated.

612554.name: Metric Reservation
612554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 36% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612554.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 54% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

612555.name: Sentinel Satellite
612555.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
612555.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.

612556.name: Polarization Receptor
612556.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by 0.40%.
612556.enhanced_desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by 0.60%.

612557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
612557.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by 0.30%.
612557.enhanced_desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by 0.45%.

612620.name: Path Resonance: Elation
612620.desc: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for 3 – 5 time(s).

612621.name: Resonance Formation: Doomsday Carnival
612621.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a 150% base chance to apply Sensory Pursuit to enemies for 1 turn.

612622.name: Resonance Formation: Dance of Growth
612622.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every 20% Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.

612623.name: Resonance Formation: Instant Win
612623.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates 40% Energy. When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, Path Resonance additionally regenerates 5% Energy.

612624.name: Resonance Interplay: The Taste of Anglerfish
612624.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels 1 debuff on 1 ally.

612625.name: Resonance Interplay: Guinea Pig in Ice Coffin
612625.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a 150% base chance to Freeze the enemy target for 1 turn(s).

612626.name: Resonance Interplay: Unending Night
612626.desc: When Path Resonance deals Fire/Wind/Physical/Lightning DMG, there is a 50% base chance to apply a DoT of the same Type, lasting for 1 turns.

612627.name: Resonance Interplay: Pit and Pendulum
612627.desc: When using the Path Resonance, for every 20 Energy consumed, the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies will have their action Advanced Forward by 10%.

612630.name: Auto-Harmonica: Whitest Night
612630.desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, they deal Aftertaste DMG equal to 55% of their ATK for 1 to 3 time(s).
612630.enhanced_desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, they deal Aftertaste DMG equal to 60% of their ATK for 1 – 3 time(s). Moreover, increases Aftertaste DMG by 35%.

612631.name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
612631.desc: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 1 extra time(s).
612631.enhanced_desc: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 2 extra time(s).

612632.name: Champion's Dinner: Cat's Cradle
612632.desc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by 15%.
612632.enhanced_desc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as Follow-up ATK. Increases DMG dealt by Follow-up ATKs by 55%.

612640.name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
612640.desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 60% of the original DMG.
612640.enhanced_desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal extra Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 90% of the original DMG.

612641.name: Just Keep on Crying!
612641.desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by 8% until the end of their next action.
612641.enhanced_desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by 12% until the end of their next action.

612642.name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
612642.desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 4% until the end of their next action.
612642.enhanced_desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 6% until the end of their next action.

612643.name: The Painted Albatross
612643.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 24% of their ATK to all enemies hit.
612643.enhanced_desc: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 36% of their ATK to all enemies hit.

612644.name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
612644.desc: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, the Follow-up ATK DMG within this attack increases by 4%.
612644.enhanced_desc: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, the Follow-up ATK DMG within this attack increases by 6%.

612645.name: Aiden Gravitational Rainbow
612645.desc: When a character launches Follow-up ATKs on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed by 12%.
612645.enhanced_desc: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs on enemies, the attacked enemies' actions are delayed by 12%, and there is a 10% base chance to cause Imprisonment on the enemies, lasting for 1 turn(s).

612646.name: Twenty-First Military Rule
612646.desc: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, there is a 65% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
612646.enhanced_desc: After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, there is a 100% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

612650.name: Exemplary Conduct
612650.desc: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 9%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).
612650.enhanced_desc: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 12%. This effect can stack up to 9 time(s).

612651.name: Mostly Harmful
612651.desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 35% when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
612651.enhanced_desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50% when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.

612652.name: Suspiria
612652.desc: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 26%.
612652.enhanced_desc: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 39%.

612653.name: Pale Fire
612653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by 26%.
612653.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by 39%.

612654.name: Back to the Lighthouse
612654.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a Follow-up ATK, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by 24%.
612654.enhanced_desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a Follow-up ATK, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by 36%.

612655.name: Doctor of Love
612655.desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by 10% of their Max HP.
612655.enhanced_desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by 15% of their Max HP.

612656.name: Platinum Age
612656.desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by 40% for 1 turn(s).
612656.enhanced_desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by 40% for 2 turn(s).

612657.name: Clockwork Apple
612657.desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by 16% for 1 turn(s).
612657.enhanced_desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by 16% for 2 turn(s).

612720.name: Path Resonance: Propagation
612720.desc: Consumes 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover 2 Skill Point(s) and become affected by Metamorphosis. Metamorphosis lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.

612721.name: Resonance Formation: Proboscis
612721.desc: Extends the duration of Metamorphosis for 1 turn. After a character with Metamorphosis defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates 20% Energy.

612722.name: Resonance Formation: Phenol Compounds
612722.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from 100 to 200 points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates 1.0% Energy for Path Resonance.

612723.name: Resonance Formation: Crystal Pincers
612723.desc: Metamorphosis additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by 40%. Only when a character is under the Metamorphosis effect can they cause Spores to burst. Every time a character causes 1 Spore to burst, additionally deals Basic ATK DMG equal to 80% of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to 3 time(s) on the same target.

612724.name: Resonance Interplay: Superposition Eye
612724.desc: After using Path Resonance, nullifies all DMG received by a single target ally except DoT. This status is dispelled after being attacked. If the target ally's current HP percentage is lower than 50% when Path Resonance is used, it will additionally recover 1 Skill Point(s).

612725.name: Resonance Interplay: Adherent Microbial Mat
612725.desc: When using Path Resonance, a single target ally gains a Shield equal to 60% of Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

612726.name: Resonance Interplay: Compounded Macrospore
612726.desc: When using Path Resonance, heals the target ally for 50% of their Max HP. 200% of the healing that exceeds Max HP will be evenly distributed among other characters.

612727.name: Resonance Interplay: Condensation Cavity
612727.desc: Characters in the Metamorphosis status deal 20% more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a 10% base chance to Freeze hit targets for 1 turns.

612730.name: Spore Discharge
612730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spore(s).
612730.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spores. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

612731.name: Fungal Pustule
612731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s).
612731.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s). The max number of Spores that can be possessed increases to 9.

612732.name: Scythe Limbs
612732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 45%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.

612740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
612740.desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 2 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.
612740.enhanced_desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 3 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.

612741.name: Lytic Enzyme
612741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 35% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
612741.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 50% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.

612742.name: Metabolic Cavity
612742.desc: For each Spore that bursts, heals the character with the lowest HP percentage by 10% of their Max HP.
612742.enhanced_desc: For each Spore possessed by all enemies, reduces the DMG received by all allies by 0.8%, After the Spores burst, heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage by 12% of their Max HP.

612743.name: Excitatory Gland
612743.desc: If the team has 0 Skill Points when an ally uses their Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
612743.enhanced_desc: If the Skill Point is 0 when using Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point and has a 50% fixed chance of further recovering 1 Skill Point.

612744.name: Exposed Brain Matter
612744.desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
612744.enhanced_desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 35% of the original DMG to adjacent targets.

612745.name: Intersegmental Membrane
612745.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
612745.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

612746.name: Catalyst
612746.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 20% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).
612746.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 30% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

612750.name: Osseus Blade
612750.desc: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by 9%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).
612750.enhanced_desc: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by 12%. This effect can stack up to 9 time(s).

612751.name: Spinal Spur
612751.desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 24%.
612751.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 36%.

612752.name: Channeled Needle
612752.desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 40%.
612752.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 60%.

612753.name: Conjunctiva
612753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
612753.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 2 turn(s).

612754.name: Scaled Wing
612754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 1 turn(s).
612754.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 2 turn(s).

612755.name: Compound Eye
612755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s) across all allies.
612755.enhanced_desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) across all allies.

612756.name: Sporangium
612756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 3 extra Energy.
612756.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 4 extra Energy.

612757.name: Vesicle
612757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.
612757.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 15% of their Max HP.

612820.name: Path Resonance: "Erudition"
612820.desc: Consume 100 Energy to resonate with the Path of Erudition. Path Resonance links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting Synapse Resonance on all enemies and dealing Imaginary DMG to them.

612821.name: Resonance Formation: Melt Core
612821.desc: When an enemy target with Synapse Resonance is attacked by Ultimate, the enemy target with the highest Max HP takes increased DMG equal to 50% of the attacking character's ATK.

612822.name: Resonance Formation: Chain Contagion
612822.desc: When characters defeat an enemy with Synapse Resonance, the effect is additionally triggered for 2 time(s).

612823.name: Resonance Formation: Memetic Inversion
612823.desc: When an enemy target appears, regenerates Path Resonance Energy equal to 5.0% of the combined Max Energy of all characters.

612826.name: Resonance Interplay: Full Scan
612826.desc: When enemies with Synapse Resonance are attacked by Follow-up ATKs, the effect is additionally triggered 1 time and the available Synapse Resonance count is not reduced.

612827.name: Resonance Interplay: Data Reinforcement
612827.desc: Attacks against Weakness Broken enemies do not reduce the available Synapse Resonance count.

612830.name: BCI-34 Gray Matter
612830.desc: When entering battle, charges the Brain in a Vat by 65%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the Brain in a Vat by 35%.
612830.enhanced_desc: When entering battle, charges Brain in a Vat by 100%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge Brain in a Vat by 40% or 5% respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.

612831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
612831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the Brain in a Vat by 50%.
612831.enhanced_desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the Brain in a Vat by 50%. When the Brain in a Vat is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

612832.name: VEP-18 Occipital Lobe
612832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 20%. When an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
612832.enhanced_desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 25%. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%.

612840.name: Attachment: Vestibular System
612840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 80%, lasting until this ability ends.
612840.enhanced_desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 90%. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.

612841.name: Imitation: Transmitter Synthesis
612841.desc: For every 1 Energy that exceeds the characters' Max Energy, charges Brain in a Vat by 0.8%.
612841.enhanced_desc: For every 1 Energy that exceeds the characters' Max Energy, charges Brain in a Vat by 1.2%.

612842.name: Implant: Explicit Memory
612842.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turns.
612842.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turns.

612843.name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway
612843.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 15% of the character's ATK.
612843.enhanced_desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 20% of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.

612844.name: Analysis: Subliminal Sensation
612844.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. After entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to 60% of their respective Max Energy.
612844.enhanced_desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%. After entering battle, regenerates energy equal to 100% of the character's Max Energy.

612845.name: Load: Striated Cortex
612845.desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
612845.enhanced_desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.

612846.name: Stimulation: Saltatory Conduction
612846.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.
612846.enhanced_desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 24%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.

612850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
612850.desc: For every Blessing of Erudition currently in possession, Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 7%, stacking up to 6 times.
612850.enhanced_desc: For every Blessing of Erudition currently in possession, Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 10%, stacking up to 9 times.

612851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
612851.desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 18%.
612851.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 27%.

612852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
612852.desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 30%.
612852.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 45%.

612853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
612853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 50% more DMG.
612853.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 75% more DMG.

612854.name: Candle of Delayed Diffraction
612854.desc: After characters use an AoE ATK ability, their ATK increases by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612854.enhanced_desc: After characters use an AoE ATK ability, their ATK increases by 40%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

612855.name: Canopy of Mottled Metal
612855.desc: After characters use an AoE ATK ability, their DEF increases by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
612855.enhanced_desc: After characters use an AoE ATK ability, their DEF increases by 40%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

612856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
612856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 16% of their Max HP.
612856.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.

612857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
612857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 50% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
612857.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 100% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.

615020.name: The Architects
615020.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Preservation. Provides all allies with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 80% of their respective Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s). Based on the total Shield Effect of all allies, deals Physical DMG to all enemies.

615030.name: Divine Construct: Resonance Transfer
615030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
615030.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 100% of the character's current Shield Effect plus 20% of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.

615031.name: Divine Construct: Metastatic Field
615031.desc: After a character is attacked, deals Quake DMG to the attacker, equal to 280% of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
615031.enhanced_desc: After a character is attacked, deals Quake DMG to the attacker, equal to 420% of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

615032.name: Divine Construct: Macrosegregation
615032.desc: Characters gain a special Shield. When characters obtain other Shields, this special Shield will increase by 100% of the new Shield Effect. At the start of the character's turn, lose 90% of the Shield Effect that exceeds 30% of the character's Max HP.
615032.enhanced_desc: Characters gain a special Shield. When characters obtain other Shields, this special Shield will increase by 100% of the new Shield Effect. At the start of the character's turn, lose 85% of the Shield Effect that exceeds 45% of the character's Max HP.

615040.name: Interstellar Construct: Shear Structure
615040.desc: Characters deal 10% increased Quake DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take Quake DMG equal to 25% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
615040.enhanced_desc: Characters deal 15% increased Quake DMG to their target, and other targets also take Quake DMG equal to 30% of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.

615041.name: Interstellar Construct: Solid Solution
615041.desc: Deals increased Quake DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 80% of the character's current DEF.
615041.enhanced_desc: Deals increased Quake DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to 120% of the character's current DEF.

615042.name: Interstellar Construct: Safe Load
615042.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 40% of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of 120% of their Base ATK.
615042.enhanced_desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by 60% of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of 160% of their Base ATK.

615043.name: Interstellar Construct: Sanctuary
615043.desc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a Shield that can block DMG equal to 10% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).
615043.enhanced_desc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a Shield that can block DMG equal to 15% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615044.name: Interstellar Construct: Quadrangular Pyramid
615044.desc: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by 30%.
615044.enhanced_desc: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by 35%.

615045.name: Interstellar Construct: Hypereutectoid
615045.desc: When a character provides Shields to an ally, both units will increase their DMG dealt by 20%, stacking up to 5 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).
615045.enhanced_desc: When a character provides Shields to an ally, both units will increase their DMG dealt by 30%, stacking up to 5 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).

615046.name: Interstellar Construct: Inversion Cube
615046.desc: Increases CRIT Rate of Quake DMG dealt by characters by 20% and CRIT DMG by 50%.
615046.enhanced_desc: Increases CRIT Rate of Quake DMG dealt by characters by 30% and CRIT DMG by 75%.

615051.name: Construct: Sentinel
615051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 16% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615051.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to 24% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615052.name: Construct: Patch
615052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 1 turn(s).
615052.enhanced_desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615053.name: Construct: Compensation
615053.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 14% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615053.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

615055.name: Construct: Rotation
615055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 20% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
615055.enhanced_desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a 30% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.

615056.name: Construct: Burst
615056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 30%.
615056.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by 45%.

615057.name: Construct: Concentration
615057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 16%.
615057.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by 24%.

615120.name: Garden of Recollection
615120.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing all enemies for 2 turn(s).

615130.name: Perfect Experience: Fuli
615130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Dissociation for 1 turn(s).
615130.enhanced_desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation to the enemy for 1 turn(s). Additionally deals 20% more DMG dealt when Dissociation is removed

615131.name: Perfect Experience: Innocence
615131.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation on the enemy for 1 turn(s).
615131.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a 100% base chance to apply Dissociation on the enemy for 1 turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.

615132.name: Perfect Experience: Reticence
615132.desc: After an enemy is attacked 6 time(s), they have a 120% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
615132.enhanced_desc: After an enemy is attacked 5 time(s), they have a 150% base chance to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).

615140.name: Ultimate Experience: Dizziness
615140.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with Dissociation by 36%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after Dissociation is removed.
615140.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with Dissociation by 54%. This effect will remain for 1 turn after Dissociation is removed.

615141.name: Ultimate Experience: Insensitivity
615141.desc: After Dissociation is removed from an enemy, there is a 50% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
615141.enhanced_desc: After Dissociation is removed from an enemy, there is a 75% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

615142.name: Ultimate Experience: Hesitance
615142.desc: When Freeze is dispelled, enemy targets deal 20% less DMG, lasting for 1 turn(s).
615142.enhanced_desc: When Freeze is dispelled, enemy targets deal 24% less DMG, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615143.name: Ultimate Experience: Insight
615143.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases by 30%. After Freezing an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases by 40%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615143.enhanced_desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases by 45%. After Freezing an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases by 60%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615144.name: Ultimate Experience: Shudder
615144.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for 2 turn(s).
615144.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a 70% base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for 2 turn(s).

615145.name: Ultimate Experience: Maverick
615145.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for 1 turn(s).
615145.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, there is a 150% base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by 30%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615146.name: Ultimate Experience: Cynicism
615146.desc: After allies use an attack, there is a 40% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of 1 time(s) per enemy target per battle.
615146.enhanced_desc: After allies use an attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of 1 time(s) per enemy target per battle.

615150.name: Experience: Chronic Ruin
615150.desc: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist Frozen by 30%.
615150.enhanced_desc: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist Frozen by 45%.

615151.name: Experience: The Torment of Alienation
615151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 16%.
615151.enhanced_desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by 24%.

615152.name: Experience: Lost Memory
615152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 70% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).
615152.enhanced_desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than 50% for the first time in this battle, there's a 100% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn(s).

615153.name: Experience: Stone Cold Hatred
615153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 36%.
615153.enhanced_desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by 54%.

615154.name: Experience: Pain & Suffering
615154.desc: After characters attack a Frozen enemy target, deals Additional DMG equal to 40% of the attacker's ATK.
615154.enhanced_desc: After characters attack a Frozen enemy target, deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the attacker's ATK.

615155.name: Experience: Primordial Hardship
615155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 16%.
615155.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by 24%.

615156.name: Experience: Thrill of Escalation
615156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 8 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
615156.enhanced_desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates 12 Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.

615157.name: Experience: Responsive Excitement
615157.desc: When the Freeze on an enemy target is dispelled, the character with the lowest Shield strength gains a Shield that can block DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615157.enhanced_desc: When the Freeze on an enemy target is dispelled, the character with the lowest Shield strength gains a Shield that can block DMG equal to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615220.name: Self-Annihilator
615220.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Nihility. Inflicts Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear to all enemies for 3 turn(s). After being attacked by a character, the aforementioned DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to 25% of the original DMG.

615230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
615230.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies 2 stack(s) of Suspicion.
615230.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply 2 stack(s) of Suspicion on them. After Suspicion reaches 99 stacks for the first time, the provided DoT Vulnerability is no longer affected by the number of stacks and is set at 120%.

615231.name: An Extra Person's Diary
615231.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts either 15 or 3 stack(s) of Suspicion.
615231.enhanced_desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts either 24 or 4 stack(s) of Suspicion.

615232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
615232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally triggers extra DoT DMG calculations 1 time(s), and each DoT status currently on the target immediately deals DMG equal to 90% of the original DMG.
