615232.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations 1 time(s), and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to 135% of the original DMG.

615240.name: Beginning and End
615240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with Suspicion is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of Suspicion the defeated enemy has on 1 random enemy target(s).
615240.enhanced_desc: When an enemy inflicted with Suspicion is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of Suspicion the defeated enemy has on 2 random enemy target(s).

615241.name: Café Self-Deceit
615241.desc: When an enemy has Suspicion on them, inflicts 1 extra stack(s) of Suspicion.
615241.enhanced_desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Suspicion, the stacks it gains are doubled.

615242.name: Fatal Ailment
615242.desc: After an enemy receives DoT, they deal 5% reduced DMG, stacking up to 4 time(s) and lasting until the end of the turn.
615242.enhanced_desc: After an enemy receives DoT, they deal 7% reduced DMG, stacking up to 4 time(s) and lasting until the end of the turn.

615243.name: Night Beyond Pyre
615243.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by 30%.
615243.enhanced_desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by 45%.

615244.name: Hell is Other People
615244.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to 140% of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to enemies adjacent to it.
615244.enhanced_desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to 210% of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to all other enemy targets.

615245.name: All Things are Possible
615245.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 100% of the DoT.
615245.enhanced_desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 150% of the DoT.

615246.name: Path Through the Woods
615246.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, they gain 30 stack(s) of Suspicion.
615246.enhanced_desc: When enemy targets enter battle, they gain 45 stack(s) of Suspicion.

615250.name: Ignosticism
615250.desc: DoT effects applied by characters deal 24% more DMG.
615250.enhanced_desc: DoT effects applied by characters deal 36% more DMG.

615253.name: Tragic Lecture
615253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 10%.
615253.enhanced_desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 15%.

615254.name: Self-Manifestation
615254.desc: Reduces DEF of enemies with their Weakness Broken by 15%.
615254.enhanced_desc: Reduces DEF of enemies with their Weakness Broken by 20%.

615255.name: Emotional Decluttering
615255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).
615255.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 4%. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

615256.name: Offerings of Deception
615256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.0% of their respective Max HP.
615256.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.5% of their respective Max HP.

615257.name: Before Sunrise
615257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates 2.0 Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.
615257.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates 3.0 Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.

615320.name: Elixir Seekers
615320.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Abundance, restoring HP for all allies by 100% of the triggering character's Max HP, dispelling all debuffs, and applying Purgatorial Eradication, lasting for 3 turn(s).

615330.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
615330.desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored.
615330.enhanced_desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character receives healing. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of HP restored, and increases Dewdrop's DMG multiplier by 40% of the original multiplier.

615331.name: Mudra of Blessing
615331.desc: Charges "Dewdrop" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 60% of their current HP.
615331.enhanced_desc: Charges "Dewdrop" at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 70% of their Max HP.

615332.name: All Abundance in One Mind
615332.desc: When a character provides healing, ally targets other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 30% of the HP restored.
615332.enhanced_desc: Characters' Max HP increases by 20%. When a character provides healing, ally targets other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 35% of the HP restored.

615340.name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
615340.desc: Restores HP to the character equal to 20% of the Charge value when "Dewdrop" ruptures, up to 18% of the character's Max HP.
615340.enhanced_desc: Restores HP equal to 20% of the Charge value when "Dewdrop" ruptures, up to 24% of the character's Max HP and no less than 12% of their Max HP.

615341.name: The Blessed Many
615341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "Dewdrop" by 80%.
615341.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for "Dewdrop" by 120%.

615342.name: Candlelight Radiance
615342.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by 50% for 1 turn(s).
615342.enhanced_desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s).

615343.name: Bitter Is the Bane
615343.desc: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to 36% of their current HP.
615343.enhanced_desc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to 42% of the character's Max HP.

615344.name: Corporeal Pellucidity
615344.desc: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by 25% and increases Effect RES by 15% until after they are attacked.
615344.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by 30% and increases Effect RES by 30% until after they are attacked.

615345.name: Prajna Voyage
615345.desc: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP restored.
615345.enhanced_desc: When being healed by an ally target, characters restore extra HP equal to 45% of the amount of HP restored.

615346.name: Offering of Incinerated Flesh
615346.desc: "Dewdrop" DMG caused by characters increase its CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 50%.
615346.enhanced_desc: "Dewdrop" DMG caused by characters increase its CRIT Rate by 30% and CRIT DMG by 75%.

615350.name: Dharma Rain
615350.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by 24%, lasting for 1 turn(s).
615350.enhanced_desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615352.name: Extended Life
615352.desc: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below 50% for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to 30% of their Max HP.
615352.enhanced_desc: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below 50% for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to 45% of their Max HP.

615353.name: Mudra
615353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 16% of their Max HP.
615353.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 24% of their Max HP.

615354.name: Peril Parry
615354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 24% for 1 turn(s).
615354.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 36% for 1 turn(s).

615355.name: Back to Life
615355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 12% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.enhanced_desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 18% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.

615356.name: Force Victoire
615356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 10% for 1 turn(s).
615356.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 15% for 1 turn(s).

615357.name: Anointment
615357.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a 25% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.
615357.enhanced_desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a 25% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to 2 time(s) per turn.

615420.name: Galaxy Ranger
615420.desc: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by 100%, with the Max Energy being 200.

615430.name: Empyrean Imperium
615430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
615430.enhanced_desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost and sets the stack limit of Critical Boost to 12.

615431.name: Radiant Supreme
615431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
615431.enhanced_desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 7 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

615432.name: Sovereign Skybreaker
615432.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
615432.enhanced_desc: After a character Breaks enemy targets' Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and the DMG they deal increases by 75%. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to 2 time(s) and lasts until the character is attacked.

615440.name: Skyward Vendetta
615440.desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 150%.
615440.enhanced_desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and currently has "Critical Boost," for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by a max of 240%.

615441.name: Adept's Bow
615441.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.
615441.enhanced_desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a Follow-up ATK, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.

615442.name: Mistwraith Pursuit
615442.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
615442.enhanced_desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 times and gives a 50% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.

615443.name: Starward Demonhunt
615443.desc: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by 12%. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by 12%. This effect stacks up to 3 time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.

615444.name: Borisin Chase
615444.desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
615444.enhanced_desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, 5 turn(s) are considered to have already passed.

615445.name: Rainbow Fang
615445.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to 30% of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by 25%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615445.enhanced_desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to 45% of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by 45%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615446.name: Plague-Purging Warfare
615446.desc: If a character has 4 stack(s) or higher of Critical Boost at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by 24%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615446.enhanced_desc: If a character has 4 stack(s) or higher of Critical Boost at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615453.name: Thundering Chariot
615453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 20%.
615453.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 30%.

615454.name: Constellation Surge
615454.desc: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by 30%, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.enhanced_desc: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by 45%, lasting until the character is attacked.

615455.name: Astral Menace
615455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 8%.
615455.enhanced_desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 12%.

615456.name: Arboreal Volley
615456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.
615456.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 6 Energy.

615457.name: Arrow Shades Bow
615457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 10% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 15% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.

615520.name: Antimatter Legion
615520.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG the next time the Boundary Resonance is triggered, up to 20 hits.

615530.name: Quasar Meltdown Constant
615530.desc: Every time a character loses or heals 20% of their HP, obtain 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect, with up to 8 stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restored equals to 100% of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by 30%.
615530.enhanced_desc: Every time a character loses or heals 16% of their HP, obtain 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect, with up to 12 stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restored equals to 100% of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by 45%.

615531.name: Boundary Density Expansion Group
615531.desc: Every time a character loses or heals HP, they gain 2 stack(s) of the Grit effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.enhanced_desc: Every time a character loses or has HP restored, they gain 2 stack(s) of the Grit effect and randomly grants 1 of their other teammates 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.

615532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
615532.desc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.enhanced_desc: Receives 15% less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.

615540.name: Catastrophic Resonance
615540.desc: When characters with Grit use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by 10%. When Grit reaches more than 10 stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 30%.
615540.enhanced_desc: When characters with Grit use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by 15%. When Grit reaches more than 10 stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 45%.

615541.name: Indicative Depth of Field
615541.desc: Characters with Grit will receive 16% less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally reduces DMG by 8%.
615541.enhanced_desc: Characters with Grit will receive 20% less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally reduces DMG by 12%.

615542.name: Tide of Devastation
615542.desc: After a character loses or heals themselves for 40% accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 70% Super Break DMG.
615542.enhanced_desc: After a character loses or heals themselves for 40% accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 105% Super Break DMG.

615543.name: Decaying Implosion
615543.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for 40% in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by 10%, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by 20%.
615543.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for 40% in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by 15%, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by 30%.

615544.name: Disciplinary Flicker
615544.desc: If a character's HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP.
615544.enhanced_desc: If a character's HP percentage is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than 20%.

615545.name: Disruptive Pulse
615545.desc: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than 50%, restores a set amount of Energy equal to 50% of the character's Max Energy. This effect can only trigger again after 4 turn(s).
615545.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than 60%, restores a set amount of Energy equal to 50% of the character's Max Energy and 1 Skill Point(s). This effect can only trigger again after 4 turn(s).

615546.name: Regressive Bull Market
615546.desc: When characters enter battle, gain 12 stack(s) of Grit.
615546.enhanced_desc: When characters enter battle, gain 18 stack(s) of Grit.

615551.name: Reflection
615551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 1% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
615551.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 30% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.

615553.name: Quasar Jet
615553.desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 24%.
615553.enhanced_desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 36%.

615554.name: Metric Reservation
615554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 100% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).
615554.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 150% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

615555.name: Sentinel Satellite
615555.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
615555.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.

615556.name: Polarization Receptor
615556.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by 30% until the start of the next turn.
615556.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by 45% until the start of the next turn.

615557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
615557.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by 16% until the start of the next turn.
615557.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by 24% until the start of the next turn.

615620.name: Masked Fools
615620.desc: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemies for 5 – 10 time(s). And all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG are all considered as Follow-up ATK DMG, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615630.name: Vineyard: Against the Night
615630.desc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 80% of their ATK after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched. This status can deal DMG up to 5 time(s).
615630.enhanced_desc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 120% of their ATK after the next time a Follow-up ATK is launched. This status can deal DMG up to 5 time(s).

615631.name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
615631.desc: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 1 extra time(s).
615631.enhanced_desc: When characters launch Follow-up ATKs to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 2 extra time(s).

615632.name: Invitation to a Beheading: Weeping Blackbox
615632.desc: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by 25%. This can trigger a max of 2 time(s) per enemy target's turn.
615632.enhanced_desc: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by 25%. This can trigger a max of 3 time(s) per enemy target's turn.

615640.name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
615640.desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 60% of the original DMG.
615640.enhanced_desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 90% of the original DMG.

615641.name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
615641.desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 4% until the end of their next action.
615641.enhanced_desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 6% until the end of their next action.

615642.name: The Painted Albatross
615642.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 24% of their ATK to all enemies hit.
615642.enhanced_desc: For each enemy hit by a character's Follow-up ATK, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 36% of their ATK to all enemies hit.

615643.name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
615643.desc: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, increases Follow-up ATK DMG by 4%, stacking up to 24 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
615643.enhanced_desc: When a character deals Follow-up ATK DMG to an enemy target, increases Follow-up ATK DMG by 5%, stacking up to 30 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.

615644.name: As Good As Fleming
615644.desc: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 8% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).
615644.enhanced_desc: When a character uses a Follow-up ATK on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 12% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).

615645.name: A Fish Discovered Fire
615645.desc: Characters' Follow-up ATK DMG ignores 20% of the target's DEF.
615645.enhanced_desc: Characters' Follow-up ATK DMG ignores 27% of the target's DEF.

615646.name: Last of the Taraka
615646.desc: Aftertaste DMG dealt by characters increases by 70%.
615646.enhanced_desc: Aftertaste DMG dealt by characters increases by 105%.

615650.name: Behold Those Fools
615650.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Follow-up ATKs by 44%.
615650.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Follow-up ATKs by 66%.

615651.name: Mostly Harmful
615651.desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 35% when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.
615651.enhanced_desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50% when characters deal Follow-up ATK DMG.

615652.name: Suspiria
615652.desc: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 26%.
615652.enhanced_desc: Increases characters' Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by 39%.

615653.name: Pale Fire
615653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by 26%.
615653.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by 39%.

615654.name: Back to the Lighthouse
615654.desc: When characters use a Follow-up ATK, restore 6 Energy. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.
615654.enhanced_desc: When characters use a Follow-up ATK, restore 8 Energy. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.

615655.name: Doctor of Love
615655.desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by 10% of their Max HP.
615655.enhanced_desc: After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, restores their HP by 15% of their Max HP.

615656.name: Platinum Age
615656.desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by 40% for 1 turn(s).
615656.enhanced_desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increase their DEF by 40% for 2 turn(s).

615657.name: Clockwork Apple
615657.desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by 16% for 1 turn(s).
615657.enhanced_desc: After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, increases SPD by 16% for 2 turn(s).

615720.name: Swarm King Progeny
615720.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Enables a target ally to immediately take action and recover 5 Skill Point(s). Gains the Levitation effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has Levitation, Boundary Equation regenerates 50 Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.

615730.name: Spore Discharge
615730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spore(s).
615730.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spores. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

615731.name: Fungal Pustule
615731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s).
615731.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s). The max number of Spores increases by 3.

615732.name: Scythe Limbs
615732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
615732.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 45%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.

615740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
615740.desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 2 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.
615740.enhanced_desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 3 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.

615741.name: Lytic Enzyme
615741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 35% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
615741.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 50% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.

615742.name: Excitatory Gland
615742.desc: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by 30%. After consuming Skill Points, there is a 15% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.enhanced_desc: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by 50%. After consuming Skill Points, there is a 20% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

615743.name: Exposed Brain Matter
615743.desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
615743.enhanced_desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 35% of the original DMG to adjacent targets.

615744.name: Intersegmental Membrane
615744.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
615744.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them decreases by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

615745.name: Catalyst
615745.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 20% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).
615745.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 30% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

615746.name: Blocker Amine
615746.desc: After enemy targets receive DMG from Spores, their DEF decreases by 1%. This effect can stack up to 15 stack(s).
615746.enhanced_desc: After enemy targets receive DMG from Spores, their DEF decreases by 1%. This effect can stack up to 20 stack(s).

615750.name: Osseus Blade
615750.desc: Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by 24%.
615750.enhanced_desc: Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by 36%.

615751.name: Spinal Spur
615751.desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 24%.
615751.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 36%.

615752.name: Channeled Needle
615752.desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 40%.
615752.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 60%.

615753.name: Conjunctiva
615753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
615753.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 2 turn(s).

615754.name: Scaled Wing
615754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 1 turn(s).
615754.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 2 turn(s).

615755.name: Compound Eye
615755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s) across all allies.
615755.enhanced_desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) across all allies.

615756.name: Sporangium
615756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 3 extra Energy.
615756.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 4 extra Energy.

615757.name: Vesicle
615757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.
615757.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 15% of their Max HP.

615820.name: Astral Ecology School
615820.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting Central Link on all enemies and regenerating Energy equal to 50% of Max Energy to all allies.

615830.name: BCI-34 Gray Matter
615830.desc: When entering battle, charges the Brain in a Vat by 65%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the Brain in a Vat by 35%.
615830.enhanced_desc: When entering battle, charges Brain in a Vat by 100%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge Brain in a Vat by 40% or 5% respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.

615831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
615831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the Brain in a Vat by 50%.
615831.enhanced_desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the Brain in a Vat by 50%. When the Brain in a Vat is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

615832.name: VEP-18 Occipital Lobe
615832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 20%. After an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
615832.enhanced_desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 25%. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%.

615840.name: Attachment: Vestibular System
615840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 80%, lasting until this ability ends.
615840.enhanced_desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 90%. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.

615841.name: Implant: Explicit Memory
615841.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turns.
615841.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turns.

615842.name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway
615842.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 15% of the character's ATK.
615842.enhanced_desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 20% of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.

615843.name: Analysis: Subliminal Sensation
615843.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. Upon entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to 60% of their respective Max Energy.
615843.enhanced_desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%. Upon entering battle, regenerates energy equal to 100% of the character's Max Energy.

615844.name: Load: Striated Cortex
615844.desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
615844.enhanced_desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.

615845.name: Stimulation: Saltatory Conduction
615845.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.
615845.enhanced_desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 24%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.

615846.name: Coordination: Resonance Nucleus
615846.desc: After characters use Brain in a Vat to use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 60%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615846.enhanced_desc: After characters use Brain in a Vat to use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 90%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
615850.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 18%.
615850.enhanced_desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 27%.

615851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
615851.desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 18%.
615851.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 27%.

615852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
615852.desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 30%.
615852.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 45%.

615853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
615853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 50% more DMG.
615853.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 75% more DMG.

615854.name: Ion-Thruster Sword
615854.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 24%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615854.enhanced_desc: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615855.name: Steel Forged Ribbon
615855.desc: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by 5.0% for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of 5 time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by 7.5% for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of 5 time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
615856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 16% of their Max HP.
615856.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.

615857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
615857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 50% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
615857.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 100% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.

616120.name: Time's Miracle
616120.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemy targets with a high chance of Freezing them for 1 turn(s). After being attacked by memosprite while under this Freeze effect, additionally take True DMG equal to 8% of Max HP. Every time the enemy target is afflicted with this Freeze state, this DMG can be triggered a maximum of 4 time(s).

616130.name: Infallible Instinct
616130.desc: When characters take action, both them and their memosprite gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession." When memosprites take action, both them and their memomaster gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession."
616130.enhanced_desc: When characters take action, both them and their memosprite gain 1 stack(s) of "Obsession." When memosprites take action, both them and their memomaster gain 2 stack(s) of "Obsession."

616131.name: Unaging Memory

616131.enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 1.5% of ATK to attacked target(s) for every stack of allies' total "Obsession" stacks.

616132.name: Ever-Peaceful Dream
616132.desc: After ally targets enter battle or after a memosprite is summoned, advances their action by 50% after their first turn ends and increases their DMG dealt by 50% for 4 turn(s).
616132.enhanced_desc: After ally targets enter battle or after a memosprite is summoned, advances their action by 75% after their first turn ends and increases their DMG dealt by 75% for 4 turn(s).

616140.name: Enlightenment: Cloudweave
616140.desc: When an ally target is attacked, gain 2 stack(s) of "Obsession."
616140.enhanced_desc: When an ally target is attacked, gain 3 stack(s) of "Obsession."

616141.name: Enlightenment: Ridgesew
616141.desc: After an ally target defeats any enemy target, all allies gain 4 stack(s) of "Obsession."
616141.enhanced_desc: After an ally target defeats any enemy target, all allies gain 6 stack(s) of "Obsession."

616142.name: Enlightenment: Wavebind
616142.desc: After ally targets enter battle or after memosprites are summoned, they receive 6 stack(s) of "Obsession."
616142.enhanced_desc: After ally targets enter battle or after memosprites are summoned, they receive 9 stack(s) of "Obsession."

616143.name: Enlightenment: Eulogy of the Coast
616143.desc: Each stack of "Obsession" additionally increases DMG dealt by 0.3%.
616143.enhanced_desc: Each stack of "Obsession" additionally increases DMG dealt by 0.4%.

616145.name: Enlightenment: Dawn Distilled
616145.desc: Every time an enemy target is attacked by different ally targets, increases their DMG taken by 4%, up to 6 stacks and lasting till the end of the turn.
616145.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is attacked by different ally targets, increases their DMG taken by 6%, up to 6 stacks and lasting till the end of the turn.

616146.name: Enlightenment: Sunset Melted
616146.desc: Every time an enemy target is hit by different ally targets, decreases their DMG dealt by 3% for up to 6 stacks, lasting till the end of the turn.
616146.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is hit by different ally targets, decreases their DMG dealt by 4% for up to 6 stacks, lasting till the end of the turn.

616150.name: Acuity: Warmth of Blades
616150.desc: Increases all ally targets' ATK by 18%.
616150.enhanced_desc: Increases all ally targets' ATK by 27%.

616151.name: Acuity: Shape of Claws
616151.desc: All ally targets' DMG dealt increases by 12%.
616151.enhanced_desc: All ally targets' DMG dealt increases by 18%.

616152.name: Acuity: Patterns of Conches

616152.enhanced_desc: Increases all ally targets' DEF by 24%.

616153.name: Acuity: Stories of Monsoons

616153.enhanced_desc: Increases all ally targets' DMG dealt by 15% and additionally increases memosprites' DMG dealt by 6%.

616154.name: Acuity: Stories of Boulders
616154.desc: Increases all ally targets' DEF by 14% and additionally increases memosprites' DEF by 6%.
616154.enhanced_desc: Increases all ally targets' DEF by 21% and additionally increases memosprites' DEF by 9%.

616155.name: Acuity: Stories of Tides
616155.desc: Increases all ally targets' HP restored by 10% and additionally increases memosprites' HP restored by 4%.
616155.enhanced_desc: Increases all ally targets' HP restored by 15% and additionally increases memosprites' HP restored by 6%.

616156.name: Acuity: Scarlet Bones and Crimson Leaves
616156.desc: After a memosprite takes action, increases all ally targets' CRIT Rate by 14% for 2 turn(s).
616156.enhanced_desc: After a memosprite takes action, increases all ally targets' CRIT Rate by 21% for 2 turn(s).

616157.name: Acuity: White Hair and Pearls

616157.enhanced_desc: After a memosprite takes action, increases all ally targets' CRIT DMG by 36% for 2 turn(s).

616220.name: Death's Miracle
616220.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Nihility. Inflicts Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear to all enemy targets, lasting for 3 turn(s). After being attacked by a character, the aforementioned DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to 25% of the original DMG.

616230.name: La Communauté Inavouable
616230.desc: When enemy target is afflicted with DoT, "Murmur" gains Charge equal to 20% of the sum of ally characters' ATK.
616230.enhanced_desc: When enemy target is afflicted with DoT, "Murmur" gains Charge equal to 30% of the sum of ally characters' ATK.

616231.name: De L'existence a L'existant

616231.enhanced_desc: After an enemy target is attacked for the first time in this turn, causes "Murmur" DMG equal to 240% of original DMG.

616232.name: Une Voix Venue D'ailleurs

616232.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations 1 time, and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to 135% of the original DMG.

616240.name: Enlightenment and Extinction

616240.enhanced_desc: When enemy target's turn ends, "Murmur" gains Charge equal to 60% of the sum of ally characters' ATK.

616241.name: Lacrimi și Sfinți
616241.desc: Every time an enemy target takes "Murmur" DMG, decreases their DMG dealt by 0.5% to a max reduction of 16%.
616241.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target takes "Murmur" DMG, decreases their DMG dealt by 0.5% to a max reduction of 24%.

616242.name: Insomnia's Praise

616242.enhanced_desc: "Murmur" DMG increases by 45% of the original DMG multiplier.

616244.name: L'Écriture du Désastre

616244.enhanced_desc: "Murmur's" Charging Efficiency when gaining Charge increases by 30%.

616245.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.5% of their respective Max HP.

616246.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target becomes afflicted with a DoT status, decreases their DMG dealt by 4.5% for up to 4 stack(s).

616250.name: La Métaphore Vive

616251.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Effect Hit Rate by 36%.

616430.name: Weapons Drawn, Paths Restless

616431.name: White Feathers Fly, A Sky of Stars Vanish

616431.enhanced_desc: While an ally target has "Critical Boost," their CRIT Rate increases by 15%. For every 1% of excess CRIT Rate, increases CRIT DMG by 2%, up to a max increase of 270%.

616432.name: A Myriad Chariots, A Trial of Courage

616451.name: Strength to Overcome Hundreds

616452.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' CRIT DMG by 30%.

616453.enhanced_desc: After defeating any enemy target, restores all ally targets' HP equal to 45% of their respective Max HP.

616454.enhanced_desc: After defeating any enemy targets, increases all allies' ATK by 9%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).

616455.name: Arrow Shatters the Moon
616455.desc: At the end of an ally target's turn, advances their action by 6%.
616455.enhanced_desc: At the end of an ally target's turn, advances their action by 9%.

616456.name: Thunder Upon the Wall
616456.desc: At the beginning of an ally target's turn, they regenerate 3 Energy.
616456.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of an ally target's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.

616457.name: Verdant Branch, Vermillion String
616457.desc: After defeating any enemy targets, increases all allies' SPD by 4%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
616457.enhanced_desc: After defeating any enemy targets, increases all allies' SPD by 6%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

616520.name: Sky's Miracle
616520.desc: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemy targets, consumes all allies' HP until 60%, and increases all ally targets' Max HP by 100%. At the start of the turn, restore 100% of the acting unit's consumed HP, lasting for 4 turn(s).

616530.enhanced_desc: Increases "Blazar" Charging Efficiency by 30%. Alters the ratio of "Blazar" cleared at the start of the turn to 50%.

616531.enhanced_desc: After any ally target launches an ATK, deals Additional DMG equal to 45% of "Blazar" to the attacked targets.

616532.enhanced_desc: Decreases DMG taken by ally targets by 15%. When attacked, DMG taken by ally targets is Distributed among all allies.

616540.name: Compact Blaze

616540.enhanced_desc: When an ally target is attacked, "Blazar" DMG multiplier increases by 30% of the original multiplier, stacking up to 2 time(s) and lasting for 2 turn(s).

616546.enhanced_desc: When ally targets' HP percentage is lower than 50%, decreases their DMG taken by 15% and increases the HP restored by 30%.

616555.enhanced_desc: After an ally target's HP or Shield Effect is reduced, increases their Max HP by 30% for 2 turn(s).

616556.enhanced_desc: After an ally target's HP or Shield Effect is reduced, increases their Effect RES by 24% for 2 turn(s).

616620.name: Trickery's Miracle
616620.desc: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemy targets for 5 – 10 time(s). All allies' Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG for 2 turn(s).

616630.name: Licorice Pizza: Mint Shaved Ice

616640.name: A Silent Month in a House

616650.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of ally targets' Follow-up ATK DMG and Additional DMG by 45%.

616652.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Follow-up ATK DMG and Additional DMG dealt by 45%.

616653.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of ally targets' Follow-up ATK DMG and Additional DMG by 27%.

616656.enhanced_desc: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, increases all ally targets' DEF by 30% for 2 turn(s).

616720.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Causes one designated ally to immediately take action and recovers 5 Skill Point(s). Gains the "Levitation" effect. When any enemy unit is defeated by a character with "Levitation," Boundary Equation regenerates 50 Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.

616730.name: Müllerian Mimicry
616730.desc: Increases ally targets' ATK by 50%. Every Skill Point gained or consumed Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 6%.
616730.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' ATK by 75%. Every Skill Point gained or consumed Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 9%.

616731.name: Ejecting Spores
616731.desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, ally targets' Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt increases by 40% and "Butterfly Soul" additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 15% of the original DMG.
616731.enhanced_desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, ally targets' Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt increases by 80% and "Butterfly Soul" additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 15% of the original DMG.

616732.name: Broodwater Droplets
616732.desc: After any ally target consumes any Skill Point, increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 2%, stacking up to 35 time(s). After using Ultimate, the next time Skill Point is consumed, it will be considered as consuming 1 additional Skill Point.
616732.enhanced_desc: After any ally target consumes or gains any Skill Point, increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 3%, stacking up to 35 time(s). After using Ultimate, the next time Skill Point is consumed or gained, it will be considered as consuming or gaining 1 additional Skill Point.

616740.name: Sporocarp
616740.desc: After defeating an enemy target, Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 30%.
616740.enhanced_desc: After defeating an enemy target, Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 45%.

616741.name: Chitin Armor
616741.desc: Increases ally targets' ATK by 30%. When entering battle, additionally Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 30%.
616741.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' ATK by 35%. When entering battle, additionally Charges "Soul Chrysalis" by 50%.

616742.name: Free Cocoon
616742.desc: When "Soul Chrysalis" changes to "Butterfly Soul," restores 60% HP and increases DMG dealt while in this state by 20%.
616742.enhanced_desc: When "Soul Chrysalis" changes to "Butterfly Soul," restores 100% HP and increases DMG dealt while in this state by 30%.

616743.name: Basidiospores
616743.desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, increases the All-Type RES PEN of Basic ATK/Skill DMG by 14%.
616743.enhanced_desc: While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, increases the All-Type RES PEN of Basic ATK/Skill DMG by 21%.

616744.name: Structural Hues
616744.desc: While in "Soul Chrysalis," increases SPD by 16%. While in "Butterfly Soul," increases DMG dealt by Basic ATK / Skill by 50%.
616744.enhanced_desc: While in "Soul Chrysalis," increases SPD by 24%. While in "Butterfly Soul," increases DMG dealt by Basic ATK / Skill by 75%.

616745.name: Sensory Rods
616745.desc: For each Skill Point consumed by an ally target, their DMG taken decreases by 6% for 2 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
616745.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point consumed by an ally target, their DMG taken decreases by 6% for 2 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

616746.name: Splash Hex
616746.desc: Basic ATK DMG/Skill DMG dealt by ally targets will deal DMG equal to 10% of the original DMG to adjacent targets.
616746.enhanced_desc: Basic ATK DMG/Skill DMG dealt by ally targets will deal DMG equal to 15% of the original DMG to adjacent targets.

616750.name: Mushroom Base
616750.desc: When ally targets consume Skill Points, there is a 20% fixed chance of regenerating 1 Skill Point(s).
616750.enhanced_desc: When ally targets consume Skill Points, there is a 30% fixed chance of regenerating 1 Skill Point(s).

616751.name: Hanging Thread
616751.desc: DMG dealt increases when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 30%.
616751.enhanced_desc: DMG dealt increases when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 45%.

616752.name: Eye Spots
616752.desc: Increases CRIT DMG dealt when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 30%.
616752.enhanced_desc: Increases CRIT DMG dealt when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 45%.

616753.name: Dorsal Wings
616753.desc: Increases CRIT Rate when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 16%.
616753.enhanced_desc: Increases CRIT Rate when any ally target uses Basic ATK or Skill by 24%.

616754.name: Thickened Walls
616754.desc: After any ally target consumes Skill Points, increases their DEF by 30% for 1 turn(s).
616754.enhanced_desc: After any ally target consumes Skill Points, increases their DEF by 45% for 1 turn(s).

616755.name: Tarsal Segments
616755.desc: After any ally target consumes Skill Points, increases their SPD by 8% for 2 turn(s).
616755.enhanced_desc: After any ally target consumes Skill Points, increases their SPD by 12% for 2 turn(s).

616756.name: Lip Bristles
616756.desc: When an ally target consumes any Skill Point, regenerates 2 Energy.
616756.enhanced_desc: When an ally target consumes any Skill Point, regenerates 3 Energy.

616757.name: Budding Propagation
616757.desc: When an ally target consumes any Skill Point, restore HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.
616757.enhanced_desc: When an ally target consumes any Skill Point, restore HP equal to 15% of their Max HP.

616820.name: Reason's Miracle
616820.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemy targets. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting "Central Link" on all enemies, and regenerating Energy equal to 100% of Max Energy to all allies.

616830.name: Hippocampus TR-303
616830.desc: After an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 10%. If it is an Elite Enemy, then Charges 40%.
616830.enhanced_desc: When entering battle, charges "Brain in a Vat" by 100%. After an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 12%. If it is an Elite Enemy, then Charges 50%.

616831.name: Accumbens Nucleus DBS-45
616831.desc: When an ally target deals fatal damage to any enemy target, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 50%.
616831.enhanced_desc: When an ally target deals fatal damage to any enemy target, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 50%. Every time "Brain in a Vat" is fully Charged, SPD increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

616832.name: Dark Matter ELO-536
616832.desc: Increases All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 20%. For every enemy target on the field, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
616832.enhanced_desc: Increases All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 25%. For every enemy target on the field, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.

616840.name: Restart: Terminal Nerve
616840.desc: When ally targets use their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," increases their CRIT DMG by 80%, lasting until this ability ends.
616840.enhanced_desc: When ally target uses their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," increases their CRIT DMG by 90%, lasting until the next attack ends.

616841.name: Iterate: Cognitive Map
616841.desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
616841.enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," they gain a Shield equal in strength to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

616842.name: Analyze: Procedural Memory
616842.desc: When an ally target uses "Brain in a Vat" to use their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG dealt by 36% for 2 turn(s).
616842.enhanced_desc: When an ally target uses "Brain in a Vat" to use their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG dealt by 54% for 2 turn(s).

616843.name: Stabilize: Slow-Wave Sleep
616843.desc: After ally targets are attacked, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 6%.
616843.enhanced_desc: After ally targets are attacked, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 9%.

616844.name: Derive: Cell Demarcation
616844.desc: After an ally target uses "Brain in a Vat" to use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 60% for 2 turn(s).
616844.enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses "Brain in a Vat" to use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 90% for 2 turn(s).

616845.name: Execute: Enhanced Learning
616845.desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate to attack Weakness Broken enemies, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s).
616845.enhanced_desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate to attack Weakness Broken enemies, delay the enemy's action by 24%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s).

616846.name: Open: Direct Pathway
616846.desc: If an ally target's AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy target, then this attack deals an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
616846.enhanced_desc: If an ally target's AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy target, then this attack deals an additional set amount of DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.

616850.name: Shimmering Flag
616850.desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG dealt by 18%.
616850.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG dealt by 27%.

616851.name: Solid-State Stored Armor
616851.desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG CRIT Rate by 18%.
616851.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG CRIT Rate by 27%.

616852.name: Safely Redacted Border
616852.desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG CRIT DMG by 30%.
616852.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Ultimate DMG CRIT DMG by 45%.

616853.name: Packages Aligned by Partitions
616853.desc: When entering battle, regenerates Energy equal to 30% of Max Energy.
616853.enhanced_desc: When entering battle, regenerates Energy equal to 45% of Max Energy.

616854.name: Route of Erased Macroblocks
616854.desc: When an ally target uses their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 24% for 2 turn(s).
616854.enhanced_desc: When an ally target uses their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 36% for 2 turn(s).

616855.name: Lighthouse of Crystalline Resonance
616855.desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate, their Max HP increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).
616855.enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate, their Max HP increases by 30% for 2 turn(s).

616856.name: Optical Guiding Lens
616856.desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 20% of their Max HP.
616856.enhanced_desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 30% of their Max HP.

616857.name: Sequentially Written Track
616857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 50% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
616857.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 100% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.

616920.name: Passage's Miracle
616920.desc: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Harmony, dealing Quantum DMG to all enemy targets and Break their Weaknesses at 1000% Break Effect. When Weakness is Broken, triggers all Weakness Break effects from all Types.

616930.name: First Movement: The Frog and the Knight
616930.desc: Every time an enemy target takes 10 actual Toughness reduction, they become afflicted with 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize."
616930.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target takes 10 actual Toughness reduction, they become afflicted with 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize." Actual Toughness reduction received while Weakness Broken will also be taken into account.

616931.name: Second Movement: The Faun's Breakfast
616931.desc: After any ally target attacks any Weakness Broken enemy targets, triggers 1 instance of "Harmonize" DMG in a 8% ratio.
616931.enhanced_desc: After any ally target attacks any Weakness Broken enemy targets, triggers 1 instance of "Harmonize" DMG with a ratio of 10%, increasing the "Harmonize" DMG multiplier by 20% of the original multiplier.

616932.name: Third Movement: Rondo Form
616932.desc: When any ally target Breaks any enemy target's Weakness, the Weakness Break effects of other Type Weaknesses the enemy possesses are additionally triggered at a 50% ratio.
616932.enhanced_desc: When any ally target Breaks any enemy target's Weakness, the Weakness Break effects of other Type Weaknesses the enemy possesses are additionally triggered at a 80% ratio.

616940.name: Common Practice Period
616940.desc: After an enemy target with "Harmonize" is defeated, causes 1 random adjacent targets to gain that enemy target's "Harmonize" stacks.
616940.enhanced_desc: After an enemy target with "Harmonize" is defeated, causes 2 random adjacent targets to gain that enemy target's "Harmonize" stacks.

616941.name: Goblet of Dionysus
616941.desc: After any ally target attacks any Weakness Broken enemy targets, inflicts 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize."
616941.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Break Effect by 24%. After attacking any Weakness Broken enemy targets, inflicts 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize."

616942.name: Coronal Pulse
616942.desc: For each stack of "Harmonize" an enemy target has, increases their Break DMG taken by 1.0%.
616942.enhanced_desc: For each stack of "Harmonize" an enemy target has, increases their Break DMG taken by 1.5%.

616943.name: String Quartet
616943.desc: When "Harmonize" DMG is triggered, additionally count 5 stack(s). Increases maximum "Harmonize" stacks by 5.
616943.enhanced_desc: When "Harmonize" DMG is triggered, additionally count 6 stack(s). Increases maximum "Harmonize" stacks by 10.

616944.name: Iambic Pentameter
616944.desc: Increases the DMG multiplier of "Harmonize" by 30% of the original multiplier.
616944.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG multiplier of "Harmonize" by 45% of the original multiplier.

616945.name: Basso Continuo
616945.desc: After an ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of 50% Super Break DMG.
616945.enhanced_desc: After an ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of 75% Super Break DMG.

616946.name: Righteous Nome
616946.desc: When an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Freeze on the attacked target, lasting for 1 turn(s).
616946.enhanced_desc: When an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, there is a 150% base chance to inflict Freeze on the attacked target, lasting for 1 turn(s).

616950.name: Stagnant Weave
616950.desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, delays the enemy target's action by 20%.
616950.enhanced_desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, delays the enemy target's action by 30%.

616951.name: Original Declaration
616951.desc: Increases ally targets' Break DMG dealt by 8%.
616951.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Break DMG dealt by 12%.

616952.name: Serene Storm
616952.desc: Increases ally targets' Break Effect by 30%.
616952.enhanced_desc: Increases ally targets' Break Effect by 45%.

616953.name: Linear Melody
616953.desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases the attacker's SPD by 12% for 3 turn(s).
616953.enhanced_desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases the attacker's SPD by 18% for 3 turn(s).

616954.name: Cross Rhythm
616954.desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases all ally targets' Break Effect by 40% for 3 turn(s).
616954.enhanced_desc: When any ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, increases all ally targets' Break Effect by 60% for 3 turn(s).

616955.name: Free Tonality
616955.desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemy targets by 16%.
616955.enhanced_desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemy targets by 24%.

616956.name: Duke of Omens
616956.desc: Decreases DEF of Weakness Broken enemy targets by 15%.
616956.enhanced_desc: Decreases DEF of Weakness Broken enemy targets by 20%.

616957.name: Novel Motif
616957.desc: When ally targets Break any enemy target's Weakness, the attacker restores HP by 24% of their Max HP.
616957.enhanced_desc: When ally targets Break any enemy target's Weakness, the attacker restores HP by 36% of their Max HP.

634000.desc: When entering the Day, ally target's restores HP equal to 30% of their own Max HP. When ally target's turn starts during the Day, they restore HP equal to 5% of their own Max HP. During the Night, increases all allies' Max HP by 0%, final DMG dealt by 30%, and all enemies' final DMG dealt by 15%.

634010.name: Dreamlike Goldweaver
634010.desc: During the Day, after all ally targets perform 8 attacks in total, the following effect is activated: Increases SPD by 40% in the Day. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634011.name: Flawless Finery
634011.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and will not be reset.

634012.name: Rondo Finery
634012.desc: Decreases the number of attacks needed to activate the effect by 6. When activated, advances all ally targets' actions by 100%.

634013.name: Bloodstained Finery
634013.desc: Increases the number of attacks needed to activate the effect by 8. When activated, increases SPD by an additional 50%.

634016.name: Weave Threads of Romance
634016.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. After activating this effect, increases ally targets' SPD by an additional 30% during the Day.

634017.name: Weave Threads of Beauty
634017.desc: After activating the effect, each time an ally target uses an attack during the Day, additionally increases their SPD by 2%. This can stack up to 60% each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634018.name: Weave Threads of Fate
634018.desc: After activating the effect, increases a unit's final DMG dealt by 20% during the Day for every 100 SPD it has.

634020.name: Connected Infinite Gates
634020.desc: During the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG by 25%. When entering the Day, activates all allies' Ultimates.

634021.name: A Fairytale About Dawn
634021.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. Increases ally targets' final DMG by an additional 20% during the Day.

634022.name: A Fairytale About The Past
634022.desc: After an ally target defeats an enemy target during the Day, regenerates Energy equal to 50% of Max Energy.

634023.name: A Fairytale About Us
634023.desc: This Boon and its enhancements also take effect at Night and will not be reset. When Night descends during Evernight, activates all allies' Ultimates.

634026.name: A Prophecy Bringing Strife
634026.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. Increases ally targets' final DMG by an additional 25% during the Day.

634027.name: A Prophecy Leaving Hope
634027.desc: During the Day, for every 1 enemy target an ally target's attack hits, the attacker restores HP equal to 6% of Max HP when the next turn starts. Stacks up to 10 times.

634028.name: A Prophecy Continuing Myths
634028.desc: After an ally target uses Ultimate during the Day, increases the final DMG dealt by 4%. This can stack up to 60% each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634030.name: Meeting Death's Palm
634030.desc: During the Night, ally targets' Max HP increases by 30%. After HP is reduced, increases the next attack's final DMG dealt by 50%.

634031.name: Fated to Decay
634031.desc: Increases the Night ratio by 25%. After ally target's HP is reduced, additionally increases final DMG by 40%.

634032.name: Fated to Wither
634032.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and will not be reset.

634033.name: Fated to Perish
634033.desc: During the Night, this Boon and its enhancement will also consider any non-overflow healing of an ally target as HP reduction.

634036.name: Blooms Before Unnamed Graves
634036.desc: Increases the Night ratio by 25%. Increases ally targets' Max HP by an additional 45% during the Night.

634037.name: New Sprout on Dead Branch
634037.desc: During the Night, for every 50% HP in total reduced from an ally target, increases their Max HP by 5.0%. This can stack up to 65% each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634038.name: Butterflies on the Returning Road
634038.desc: Each time an ally target's HP is reduced, increases their final DMG dealt by 2%. Triggers up to 1 time in a single action. This can stack up to 60% each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634040.name: Crowned in Blood
634040.desc: During the Night, after an ally target's total HP is reduced by 50%, activate the following effect: When any ally's turn ends, they restore HP equal to 20% of Max HP. Increases final DMG by 25% during the Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634041.name: Lance of Divine Fury
634041.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and will not be reset.

634042.name: Blade of Human Rage
634042.desc: Increases the HP percentage reduction required to activate the effect by 40%. After activating effect, additionally increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% during the Night.

634043.name: Shield of Triumphant Return
634043.desc: Decreases the HP percentage reduction required to activate the effect by 25%. When activating the effect, the entire team restores HP equal to 100% of their Max HP, and the next 5 attack(s) additionally restore HP equal to 30% of their Max HP.

634046.name: Slay the Thousand Foes
634046.desc: Increases the Night ratio by 25%. After activating effect, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt during the Night by an additional 40%.

634047.name: Slay the Honorless Tyrant
634047.desc: After activating the effect, for every 10% HP reduced, increases the HP restored by 1.0% and final DMG dealt by 1.0% during the Night. A maximum increase of 40% HP restoration and 40% final DMG can be gained in each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634048.name: Slay the Maddened God
634048.desc: After activating effect, increases ally targets' Max HP equal to 16% of current Max HP during the Night.

634050.name: Endless Feasting
634050.desc: During the Day, increases enemy targets' final DMG taken by 25% and inflicts enemy targets with "Swan Song": At the start of each turn, take Physical Additional DMG equal to 400% base DMG.

634051.name: Unending Carnival
634051.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. During the Day, increases enemy targets' final DMG taken by 20%.

634052.name: Unwaking Slumber
634052.desc: After enemy targets receive ally targets' attacks during the Day, triggers 1 instance of "Swan Song" DMG at a ratio of 100%.

634053.name: Unceasing Poems
634053.desc: "Swan Song" is considered as "Bleed." Increases the DMG multiplier of "Swan Song" by 100% of the original multiplier, and deals DoT at the beginning of each turn.

634056.name: The Besotted's Elegy
634056.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. During the Day, increases enemy targets' final DMG taken by 25%.

634057.name: The Sorrowful's Elegy
634057.desc: Each time "Swan Song" deals DMG during the Day, increases its DMG by 5% of the original multiplier. This can stack up to 200% each Day/Night. Resets when Day/Night changes.

634058.name: The Lost's Elegy
634058.desc: Each time other DoTs are received, triggers 1 instance of "Swan Song" DMG at a ratio of 50%. This triggers up to 4 time(s) in each action.

634060.name: Phantom Strider
634060.desc: When Elite Enemies are defeated in battle, earns 50 additional Cosmic Fragments. This effect triggers up to 1 time every battle. During the Night, increases final DMG dealt to Elite Enemies by 30% and reduces DMG taken from Elite Enemies by 10%.

634061.name: Unblinking in Lies
634061.desc: Increases Night ratio by 25%. During the Night, increases additional Cosmic Fragments earned by 35 when Elite Enemies are defeated. The effect disappears during the first Day-Night change.

634062.name: Unflinching in Tricks
634062.desc: When entering battle and if you possess more than 500 Cosmic Fragments, additionally increases ally targets' final DMG dealt to Elite Enemies by 80% during the Night.

634063.name: Perfect in Fraud
634063.desc: In Basic Effect, increases the number of times you can gain additional Cosmic Fragments by 2 when Elite Enemies are defeated.

634066.name: Long Night Blesses Thieves
634066.desc: Increases the Night ratio by 25%. During the Night, additionally increases final DMG dealt by ally targets to Elite enemies by 40%.

634067.name: Sealed Vault Welcomes Traitors
634067.desc: In Basic Effect, increases Cosmic Fragments gained by 100 when Elite Enemies are defeated.

634068.name: Even Lies Require Skill
634068.desc: In the current Divergent Universe run, for each time this Boon's effect of earning Cosmic Fragments is triggered, deals Additional DMG equal to 40% of ATK to the attacked target after using an attack during the Night.

634070.name: Worldbearing Sword
634070.desc: When entering the Day, the first character in the current team receives "Dawn" for 2 turn(s). Characters with "Dawn" increases their final DMG dealt by 100%.

634071.name: Departure of the Sinless
634071.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 25% for 2 turn(s).

634072.name: Suffering of the Lost
634072.desc: The final DMG increase provided by "Dawn" becomes 80% and no longer last for a limited number of turns. It will lose its effect when the Day/Night changes.

634073.name: Summon of the Pathfinder
634073.desc: Characters with "Dawn" increase their CRIT DMG dealt by 160%.

634076.name: Trial of the Worldbearer
634076.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% for 2 turn(s).

634077.name: Transcendence of the Worldbearer
634077.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and when entering Night, and will not be reset.

634078.name: Return of the Worldbearer
634078.desc: Every time the team enters the Day, final DMG dealt by ally targets increases by 16%. This is stackable.

634080.name: Whispers of the Rainbow
634080.desc: During the Day, after an ally target restores HP equal to 60 times their level, increases their final DMG dealt during the Day by 5%. This is stackable up to 20% in a single Day/Night.

634081.name: O Rain, Hydrate All
634081.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 20% for 2 turn(s).

634082.name: O Wind, Caress the Woods
634082.desc: The amount of restored HP needed in the base effect decreases to 30 time(s) of this unit level. After each time the base effect is triggered and final DMG is successfully increased, Max HP increases by 3%.

634083.name: O Light, Illuminate the Pure Land
634083.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective at Night and when entering Night, and can continue to stack and reset the max stack limit.

634086.name: O Lightning, Pierce the Skies
634086.desc: Increases the Day ratio by 25%. During the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 25%.

634087.name: O Rainbow, Connect the Ends
634087.desc: The max final DMG increase in a Day period in the base effect becomes 35%.

634088.name: O Sky, Gaze Upon Lives
634088.desc: When entering the day and after the next time an ally target uses an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 1000% of the target's Max HP to the attacked target.

634090.name: Factors Elucidation
634090.desc: Immediately obtain 1 destructible Curio. Whenever a Curio is damaged or discarded, immediately obtain 35 Cosmic Fragments. This can take effect up to 5 time(s) per Domain. Increases final DMG dealt by ally targets by 25% when entering the Day, lasting for 2 turn(s).

634091.name: Art of Cause and Effect
634091.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 25% for 2 turn(s).

634092.name: Art of Soul and Flesh
634092.desc: The amount of Cosmic Fragments gained when a Curio is damaged or discarded becomes 45. When entering Boss Domains, fix 1 random destroyed Curio of 1- to 3-star rarity.

634093.name: Art of Reason and Madness
634093.desc: Immediately discards 5 Negative Curio(s). If you possess 1 or fewer Negative Curio(s), the final DMG dealt by ally targets in the base effect additionally increases by 60%.

634096.name: Profound Comprehension
634096.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Day, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% for 2 turn(s).

634097.name: Introspective Clarity
634097.desc: For every 100 Cosmic Fragments gained via this Golden Blood's Boon in this run of the Simulated Universe, ally targets' final DMG dealt in the base effect additionally increases by 12%.

634098.name: Divine Dismantling
