634098.desc: After destroying or discarding 3 Curio(s) in total, immediately obtains 1 random destructible Curio of 1- to 2-star rarity. This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per Domain.

634100.name: Gambit by the Flame
634100.desc: When entering the Night, the first character in the current team gains 2 stack(s) of "Conquer." Characters with "Conquer" consume 1 stack of "Conquer" at the end of their turn/extra turn to advance their action by 100%/gain 1 extra turn and increase final DMG dealt by 10%, lasting until the end of their next turn.

634101.name: Sieging Pawn
634101.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 25% for 2 turn(s).

634102.name: Double-Crossing Bishop
634102.desc: After consuming "Conquer," SPD increases by 60%. This effect loses effect when the Day/Night changes.

634103.name: Rampaging Knight
634103.desc: Recover 5 Skill Points when entering the Night, and the first character in the current team additionally obtains 1 stack(s) of "Conquer."

634106.name: Rule-Sundering King
634106.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% for 2 turn(s).

634107.name: Arbitrating King
634107.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.

634108.name: Fire-Crowned King
634108.desc: During the Night, the first character in the current team increases their final DMG dealt by 5% each time they take action, up to 80% within one Day/Night period. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634110.name: Dreams of Long Night
634110.desc: For every ally target on the field during the Night, final DMG dealt increases by 5%, up to a maximum of 40%.

634111.name: Silence of Dawn Stars
634111.desc: Increases the Night ratio by 25%. During the Night, ally targets' final DMG dealt increases by 20%.

634112.name: Dwell of Night Breeze
634112.desc: For every ally target on the field when entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 8% for 2 turn(s).

634113.name: Weeping of Night Veil
634113.desc: After an ally target uses an attack during the Night, deals extra Additional DMG equal to 18% of the combined Max HP value of all ally targets.

634116.name: Dream of Futuresight
634116.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% for 2 turn(s).

634117.name: Dream of Retrosight
634117.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering the Day, and will not be reset.

634118.name: Dream of Atonement
634118.desc: When ally targets become departed/disappear/become downed during the Night, increases final DMG dealt by all ally targets by 15%, with a max stack of 60% in one Day/Night period. Resets when the Day/Night changes.

634120.name: Seismic Upheaval
634120.desc: When entering the Night, all ally targets obtain a Shield equal to 75% Max HP and obtain "Quartz." Ally targets with "Quartz" increases their final DMG dealt by 50%. When an ally target no longer has a Shield or when the battle enters the Day, remove "Quartz" from them.

634121.name: Bedrock Biter
634121.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 25% for 2 turn(s).

634122.name: Kindling Igniter
634122.desc: During the Night, after every 2 turn(s), ally targets obtain a Shield equal to 100% of Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).

634123.name: Primeval Seer
634123.desc: Every time an ally target obtains a Shield during the Night, increases their final DMG dealt during the Night by 3%, stacking up to 24% in a single Day/Night.

634126.name: Terrestrial Chaser
634126.desc: Reduces the switch interval between Day and Night by 25%, up to a max reduction of 50%. When entering the Night, increases ally targets' final DMG dealt by 30% for 2 turn(s).

634127.name: Summit Ripper
634127.desc: This Boon and its enhancement effects are also effective during the Day and when entering Day, and can continue to stack and reset the max stack limit.

634128.name: Land Mender
634128.desc: Additionally increase the final DMG dealt by ally targets with "Quartz" by 50%.

670010.name: City Restorer
670010.desc: Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order: Each time it takes a turn, absorbs all allies' Shields, reducing their values to 1, and turning the absorbed values into its own Shield. Then, it deals Physical DMG equal to 2500% of its Shield value plus 1000% base DMG to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to Freeze enemies for 1 turn(s). When characters take damage, Comet Nucleus's Shield will be consumed first. When Quake DMG is triggered, 80% of Comet Nucleus's Shield will be considered as the character's Shield.

670060.name: Heartless Giant
670060.desc: "Quake" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain 1 "Mechacore Component" stack, up to 77 stack(s). After a character with a Shield is attacked, consumes all of their "Mechacore Component" to deal 7 instances(s) of random-Type "Quake" DMG equal to 177% of the current Shield Effect. Every stack consumed increases this DMG by 7%.

670140.name: Silent Hunter
670140.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, there is a 100% base chance for them to be inflicted with Dissociation that lasts for 1 turn(s). Enemies in Dissociation will resist all DMG, and all CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When the effect is dispelled, additionally deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 150% of the tallied value to all enemies. When the tallied value reaches 50% of the target's Max HP, Dissociation will immediately be dispelled.

670150.name: Mausoleum of Scars
670150.desc: Oblivion appears in the Action Order: For every 10 actual Toughness Reduction dealt by an ally, the ally's action Advances Forward by 3%. When Oblivion takes action, deals Ice DMG equal to 2000% base DMG and deals 20 Toughness Reduction to all enemies, with a 150% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state on the targets, lasting for 1 turn(s). The state increases DMG taken by 60%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

670210.name: Relative Tracer
670210.desc: When an enemy target is afflicted with "Suspicion," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a 150% base chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. When there are no adjacent targets, the state is Blasted to the original target. Each state can only be Blasted by the same target once in a single action. When one enemy target has Blasted a total of 20 time(s) or is defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to 1200% base DMG to that target and adjacent targets, with a 60% base chance to inflict Frozen that lasts for 1 turn(s).

670280.name: Self-Proof Institute
670280.desc: After Suspicion reaches 99 stacks, it will be consumed and turned into 1 stack of Self-Negation: Increases DoT dealt by attackers to this unit by 70%. Each stack additionally increases DoT dealt by 10%, stacking up to 50 time(s). At the start of an enemy's turn, they take Lightning DoT equal to 135% of base DMG and cause adjacent targets to take Lightning DoT equal to 20% of the original DMG multiplier. At 2 or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates 20% of Brain in a Vat for a random character. At 3 or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates 10% of Brain in a Vat for all allies.

670320.name: Herb Plucker
670320.desc: Inflicts "Panacea" on enemy targets when they enter battle: When "Dewdrop" breaks, charges the attacked target's "Panacea" by 5% of the Dewdrop's charge, up to 100% of the sum of all characters' Max HP. At the start of the enemy target's turn, consumes the Charge value, deals Wind DoT equal to 200% base DMG, and restores all allies' HP by 5% of Max HP. For every Charge value that equals 1% of the sum of all characters' Max HP, increases this DMG by 8% and increases the HP restored by 4%.

670350.name: Borisin
670350.desc: "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order. When "Dewdrop" breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by 600% of the Dewdrop's charge. When "Flower of Annihilation" takes action, it deals Charge value plus 1200% of base DMG Fire DMG to all enemies. Every stack of "Grit" held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by 1.5%.

670430.name: Bionic Messiah
670430.desc: When no enemy target has Fiber, Fiber will be applied to random attacked targets after characters use an attack. After targets with Fiber receive a total of 8 attacks or are defeated, the target receives Lightning DMG equal to 4500% base DMG, adjacent targets receive DMG equal to 3000% base DMG, and all allies' Max HP increases by 80%, lasting for 3 turn(s). If only 1 enemy target is attacked, then 2 attacks are considered to have been launched.

670470.name: Molten Knight
670470.desc: Every time the team obtains 9 stack(s) of Critical Boost or defeats the enemy target, fires 10 Lux Arrow(s) to strike random targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to 400% base DMG and applies 1 Spore to the attacked target, while also dealing 1 hit of Spore burst DMG. During this time, max Spore stacks will become 99.

670500.name: Voyage Monitor
670500.desc: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to 100% of the original damage after the attack. When a character's Grit is higher than 30 stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to 50% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s). Also, deal DMG equal to 1200% base DMG and 15 Toughness-Reduction to all enemies, and consume 20 stack(s) of Grit.

670580.name: Annihilation Scholar
670580.desc: After characters are attacked, receives 2 Annihilation Form(s). After launching a Counter, receives 1 Annihilation Form(s). When a character possesses 6 Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms from them and increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by 150% for 2 turn(s), as well as dealing Additional DMG equal to 650% of the character's ATK to all enemies. This DMG is considered as Ultimate DMG.

670630.name: Advisor Physician
670630.desc: DMG dealt by "Dewdrop" is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After "Dewdrop" burst as a result of the character launching a Follow-up ATK or using an attack, there is a 16% fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge "Dewdrop" for 80% of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of "Dewdrop's" Charge with a 10%/40%/40%/10% fixed chance.

670640.name: Phantom Thief
670640.desc: Calling Card appears in the Action Order: After characters launch a Follow-up ATK, their action advances by 5%. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the lineup by 100%. After this character uses an attack, deals 10 instance(s) of Aftertaste DMG equal to 40% of the character's ATK, taking effect over a max of 4 attacks. Allies' Aftertaste DMG multiplier increases by 100% of the original multiplier, and a countdown with 100 SPD appears in the Action Order. The effects last until the countdown's turn begins.

670700.name: Star-Molding Worm
670700.desc: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets increase by 100%. "Hivespawn" appears in the Action Order: when ally targets gain or consume Skill Points, "Hivespawn" gains 1 Hits Per Action for the next attack. At the start of the turn, "Hivespawn" deals Wind DMG equal to 500% base DMG to one random enemy for each Hit Per Action, and grants a Shield equal to 3% of respective Max HP for all allies. "Hivespawn"'s Hits Per Action will not be less than 10.

670720.name: Child of Calamity
670720.desc: Enemy target obtains "Borehole" when entering battle: "Borehole" will record all "Spores" numbers accumulated by the holder. After accumulating 18 "Spores," deals Quantum DMG to all enemies equal to 2200% of base DMG. For every debuff the enemy has, this DMG increases by 10%, up to a max increase of 100%. Then, the accumulated spore count is cleared.

670860.name: Useless Scholar
670860.desc: After the team uses a total of 6 Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 100% of the attacker's ATK 3 time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges Brain in a Vat to 200%, and uses Ultimate 3 times before the status ends on them.

670870.name: Aggregator
670870.desc: After allies use their Ultimates a total of 2 times, deals 2 instances of Wind DMG equal to 400% of base DMG to a random enemy and applies 1 Spore(s) to it. This DMG will deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to adjacent enemies. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances in this battle by 1 and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters by 7%, to a maximum of 20 times.

671020.name: The Pathless
671020.desc: When the character deals Quake DMG, every type of DoT effect active on the enemy target will increase the current Quake DMG multiplier by 50% of the original multiplier.

671030.name: Ecological Administrator
671030.desc: When characters deal Quake DMG, every character at Max HP will increase the current Quake DMG multiplier by 35% of the original multiplier.

671060.name: Sentimental Guardian
671060.desc: The Follow-up ATK DMG taken by enemy target increases by 60%. After the character defeats the enemy target, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT. This effect is removed after allies are attacked, lasting for 2 turn(s).

671080.name: Civilization Correspondent
671080.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can offset DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s). After dealing Ultimate DMG with an attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 600% of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked targets.

671120.name: Bookwriter
671120.desc: When enemy targets are Frozen, inflicts 10 stack(s) of "Suspicion." After suffering DoT, there is a 20% base chance the target will enter the Frozen state for 1 turn(s). Every enemy target can only enter the Frozen state through this method 1 time every 2 turn(s).

671130.name: Memory Doctor
671130.desc: "Dewdrop's" Charging Efficiency increases by 50%. After a character launches an attack, "Dewdrop" will additionally deal "Dewdrop" DMG 1 time equal to 250% of the original "Dewdrop" DMG multiplier to all Frozen enemy targets.

671170.name: Wandering Meme
671170.desc: Increases characters' Basic ATK DMG dealt by 200%. When using Basic ATK to launch an attack, enemies in the Weakness Broken state will be considered Frozen.

671180.name: Astral Computer
671180.desc: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate 4 Energy. When enemies' Dissociation state is dispelled, allies additionally regenerate 8 Energy.

671210.name: Sizzling Thunder
671210.desc: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, causes all currently active DoT on the target to immediately deal DMG equal to 180% of the original DMG. Each active DoT will apply 1 stack of Suspicion.

671230.name: Death Denier
671230.desc: Increases characters' DoT dealt by 160%. After applying a debuff on enemy targets, increases the character's Max HP by 2% to a maximum of 20 stack(s), lasting for 2 turn(s).

671240.name: Executor of Vengeance
671240.desc: After a character uses an attack, inflicts 3 stack(s) of "Suspicion" on the attacked target. Increases Vulnerability provided by "Suspicion" by 20%. When characters hit enemy targets afflicted with "Suspicion," increase CRIT DMG dealt based on 80% of the Vulnerability provided by "Suspicion."

671260.name: Jester of Anatta
671260.desc: When a character launches a Follow-up ATK, there is a 150% base chance to apply 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for 2 turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by 15.0%, decrease DEF by 30.0%, and decrease SPD by 20.0%.

671340.name: Eternal Stranger
671340.desc: When "Dewdrop" Charges, for every 1% of CRIT Rate the character has, there is a 1% fixed chance to increase the Charge value. The increased ratio equals to 50% of the character's CRIT DMG.

671350.name: Pyromancer
671350.desc: Characters' Max HP increases by 50%. For every 10 of actual Toughness Reduction dealt, Charges all allies' "Dewdrop" by 3%. When attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, charges all allies' "Dewdrop" by 6%.

671360.name: Graveward Lunatic
671360.desc: The characters' Max HP increases by 40%. After restoring HP equal to 200% of Max HP, the DMG multiplier of Aftertaste DMG dealt increases by 100% of the original DMG multiplier.

671370.name: Viscorpus
671370.desc: Increases the maximum limit of "Dewdrop" by 100%. When a character breaks "Dewdrop" by using their Basic ATK, restores 35% of this "Dewdrop's" Charge.

671400.name: Disaster-Halting Mechanism
671400.desc: After enemy targets use an attack to reduce characters' Shields, increases all allies' SPD by 35%, lasting for 2 turn(s), then gains 2 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

671410.name: Fiction's Arbiter
671410.desc: Increases DMG dealt in the next turn by 2% for each 1% actual action advance effect the character receives, up to a max of 100% action advance. This effect is additionally increased against Frozen enemy targets by 50%.

671450.name: Court of Homogeneity
671450.desc: When an enemy target attacks and if there are character(s) that have Critical Boost, increases the DMG taken by the enemy target by 40%, lasting for 2 turn(s). Meanwhile, Action Advance characters with Critical Boost. Each stack of Critical Boost Action Advances the character by 5%.

671460.name: Bounty Hunter
671460.desc: When a character's attack deals CRIT DMG, there is a 65% fixed chance to additionally deal a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 1–100% of the original DMG for 1 time(s). This is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG.

671500.name: Pre-Battle Caregiver
671500.desc: Characters' Break Effect increases by 100%. When inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy with an attack, the attacking character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 100% of their Max HP, lasting for 1 turn(s), and then deals Quake DMG equal to 1000% of the current Shield Effect to the target after an attack.

671510.name: Memosnatcher
671510.desc: When a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG, consumes their HP equal to 5% of their current HP. After this attack, there is a 50% base chance to inflict Freeze on the attack target, lasting for 1 turn(s). Every stack of Grit increases the character's Effect Hit Rate by 2%.

671520.name: Wastelander
671520.desc: After a character attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 100% Super Break DMG. After accumulating 30 stack(s) of Grit, additionally deals 100% Super Break DMG caused by this effect.

671570.name: Self-Betrayer
671570.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, recovers 2 Skill Point(s). Based on the total number of Grit stacks on all allies, for every 5 stack(s) of "Grit," increases all allies' Break DMG dealt by 2%.

671610.name: Reminiscence Artist
671610.desc: Aftertaste has a 4% base chance of causing enemy targets that are not Frozen to become Frozen, lasting for 1 turn(s). Each attack can cause this effect to be calculated for a max of 5 time(s). Increases the DMG multiplier of Aftertaste against Frozen enemies by 150% of the original multiplier.

671650.name: Fireworks Master
671650.desc: Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%. After a character launches a Follow-up ATK, deals to the attacked enemy target 1 instance of Aftertaste DMG equal to 500% of the total HP the character lost plus the HP they restored. Then, clears the accumulated HP changes. HP change is accumulated up to 200% of the character's Max HP.

671670.name: Aether Phantom
671670.desc: Increases max Spores to 5. After characters launch a Follow-up ATK, apply 3 Spore(s) to the target.

671680.name: Maniacal Chess Player
671680.desc: Increase CRIT DMG dealt by characters' Follow-up ATKs by 100%. When using "Brain in a Vat" to launch Ultimate and deal DMG to enemy targets, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK.

671700.name: Calamity Worker
671700.desc: When a character gains a Shield, causes 2 random enemy target(s) to gain 1 Spore. Spore's DMG multiplier increases by 75% of the original multiplier.

671730.name: Calamity Remnant
671730.desc: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies gain 1 stack of "Honeydew," up to 10 stack(s). After a character uses an attack, they consume all their "Honeydew" stacks. For each stack consumed, deals Additional DMG equal to 80% Max HP. This attack is considered as Basic ATK DMG.

671740.name: Diabolical Worker
671740.desc: After a character uses an attack, apply Spores to random enemy targets that were attacked. When allies take consecutive action for 1 / 2 / 3 times or more, the added number of Spores becomes 4 / 5 / 6.

671780.name: Deceiver Worker
671780.desc: Increases max Spores by 3. After a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG and if the attacked target's Spore bursts, then additionally deals Ultimate DMG equal to 250% of the character's ATK to the target. Every Spore burst by this attack increases this DMG multiplier by 30%.

671800.name: Astral Ecology Care Worker
671800.desc: Increases Ultimate DMG taken by enemy targets by 75%. Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 12% when Shielded characters are attacked.

671820.name: Block Builder
671820.desc: After characters use an attack, every debuff active on the attacked targets increases the character's ATK by 3% to a max of 99 stack(s). When the turn ends, lose 10 stacks of this ATK boost.

671840.name: Silverheart Guards
671840.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, charges Brain in a Vat by 25% and also regenerates Energy equal to 10% of Max Energy. After defeating the target, regenerates Energy equal to 60% of Max Energy.

671850.name: Anti-Organic Liquidator
671850.desc: When a character uses an Ultimate, consumes HP from all allies equal to 5% of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by 30% to a max of 4 stack(s), lasting for 2 turn(s).

672010.name: Architect Scribe
672010.desc: If a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, then all allies gain a Shield equal to 25% of their respective Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s). Every enemy target Frozen during this attack will increase the obtained Shield Effect by 5% of their respective Max HP.

672020.name: Tomb Keeper
672020.desc: Characters' Effect RES increases by 25% and "Quake" DMG dealt increases by 50%. When resisting the inflicted debuffs, deals "Quake" DMG equal to 400% of the current Shield Effect to the target. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy target.

672030.name: Planetary Purifier
672030.desc: Increases the Shield Effect gained by characters by 30%. After losing the Shield, restores HP equal to 25% of their Max HP.

672050.name: Unsinkable
672050.desc: The Shield Effect a character receives increases by 20%, for every 1% of HP that is different between the character's Max HP and current HP, the Shield Effect additionally increases by 0.8%.

672060.name: Dreamweaver
672060.desc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, deals Quake DMG equal to 360% of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked target(s).

672100.name: Scholar of Candles
672100.desc: Increases Character's CRIT DMG by 50%. When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to 100% of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for 1 turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and the team can trigger this effect 3 time(s) at most. Before the triggers are completely consumed, increase characters' CRIT DMG by 50%.

672140.name: Cognition Reviewer
672140.desc: After characters attack a non-Elite enemy target with less than 50% current HP percentage, there is a 150% base chance to inflict the Dissociation state on them, lasting for 1 turn(s), and deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to their current HP.

672150.name: Purifier
672150.desc: When enemy target's current HP is greater than 60% of Max HP, their duration of being Frozen increases by 1 turn. DMG received by Frozen enemy targets increases by 30%.

672160.name: Biographer
672160.desc: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 240% of the character's ATK to the target.

672180.name: Armed Archaeologist Team
672180.desc: After an enemy target becomes Frozen, increase the Ultimate DMG they receive by 60%. This effect will last for 2 turn(s) after Freeze is dispelled.

672200.name: Night Watch
672200.desc: When the enemy target enters battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to 10% of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed 650% of all allies' total Shield Effect.

672230.name: Doctors of Chaos
672230.desc: Increases DoT dealt by characters by 50%. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with the "Observed" state and receive Fire DoT equal to 300% of the total Max HP of all allies at the start of the turn.

672240.name: Sin Thirster
672240.desc: Characters' DoT can cause CRIT Hit. When dealing DoT, CRIT DMG cannot exceed 100%.

672250.name: Rescuer
672250.desc: When enemy targets take Toughness-Reducing DMG during an attack, they have a 100% base chance of being afflicted with Burn and receiving Fire DMG equal to 120% base DMG at the start of their turn for 2 turn(s).

672280.name: Common Mortal
672280.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, every stack of Suspicion they had will regenerate 0.30 Energy for all allies.

672340.name: Wingweaver
672340.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of "Dewdrop" by 20% up to a maximum of 4 stack(s). Also restores HP for all allies equal to 50% of their respective Max HP.

672350.name: Houyhnhnm
672350.desc: Every stack of "Grit" a character has will increase their HP restored by 2%.

672360.name: Peculiar Physician
672360.desc: Increases maximum limit of "Dewdrop" by 50%. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, restores HP equal to 10% of Max HP to the character with the lowest current HP percentage.

672370.name: Symbiote
672370.desc: Increases character's HP restored by 35%. After providing healing to ally targets, there is a 50% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger 1 time per character action.

672371.name: Tree of Discard
672371.desc: Increases characters' Outgoing Healing by 30%. After providing healing to an allied target, inflicts 2 Spore(s) to a random enemy target.

672400.name: Borderstar Gunslinger
672400.desc: After a character is attacked and if they did not take DMG from this attack, they will only lose 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

672410.name: Amnesiac
672410.desc: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of Critical Boost additionally increases CRIT Rate by 4% and CRIT DMG by 30%.

672430.name: Pacifist
672430.desc: When a character's turn begins, every stack of Critical Boost they have will restore their HP equal to 5% of their Max HP, and restore HP to teammates equal to 2% of their respective Max HP.

672470.name: Departing Wanderer
672470.desc: Increases characters' Basic ATK and Skill CRIT DMG dealt by 100%. The excess "Critical Boost" stacks will be regained at the start of the character's turn.

672480.name: Rehearser
672480.desc: Increases CRIT DMG by 8% for each stack of Critical Boost. When a character uses their Ultimate, inherits this max stack number and receives 2 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

672510.name: Gravedigger
672510.desc: After characters Break enemy targets, there is a 120% base chance to afflict it with Freeze, lasting for 1 turn(s). If this enemy target is already Frozen, then additionally deal 1 instance of Break DMG equal to 200% of the Break DMG that would have been dealt this time.

672520.name: Walker of the Scorched
672520.desc: When a character has Grit, increases their All-Type RES PEN by 15%. Each stack of Grit a character has will increase their Break Effect by 3%.

672530.name: Pyromaniac
672530.desc: Each stack of Grit increases the character's Max HP by 6%, but Maximum Restorable HP will be reduced to 80% of the additional Max HP.

672540.name: Sand Retrograder
672540.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by 20%. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD by 25%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

672580.name: Firesmith
672580.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 60%. Every 1% of HP a character loses will Charge Brain in a Vat by 0.5%.

672600.name: Battlefield Magician
672600.desc: After characters attack, receives a Shield equal to 3% of the character's Max HP for every instance of Aftertaste DMG dealt in this attack. The Shield cannot exceed 36% of the character's Max HP and lasts for 1 turn(s).

672620.name: Candy Knight
672620.desc: The Aftertaste DMG dealt by characters can ignore Weakness Type and reduce 2.5 Toughness from enemy targets. In a single attack, this effect can be triggered against each enemy target up to 7 time(s).

672630.name: Drifting Circus
672630.desc: Every time characters deal Aftertaste DMG, their Max HP increases by 5%, up to a max of 15 stack(s) and lasting for 1 turn(s).

672670.name: Balloon Merchant
672670.desc: Increases the Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters by 50%. After launching a Follow-up ATK, there is a 100% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

672680.name: Creation Vocalist
672680.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, then after their next attack, deals 2 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG to the attacked target, with each instance equal to 150% of the character's ATK.

672700.name: Phantom Larva
672700.desc: Increases Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by characters by 60%. When "Spores" burst, the DMG dealt increases by 100% of the total Collective Shield effect.

672710.name: Phantom Worker
672710.desc: The Spore DMG received by enemy targets increases by 35%. Reduces enemies' Effect RES by 10% for each Spore stack they have.

672720.name: Afterglow Worker
672720.desc: Increases Spore's DMG multiplier by 60% of the original multiplier. When Spores burst, the DMG multiplier increases additionally by 3% of the original multiplier for each debuff the enemy target has.

672721.name: Pacifist Worker
672721.desc: Every time characters consume Skill Points or have Skill Points overflow, there is a 150% base chance to inflict a random debuff on random enemy targets, lasting for 2 turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by 15.0%, decrease Effect RES by 20.0%, or decrease Effect Hit Rate by 30.0%.

672750.name: Starcrusher Worker
672750.desc: The characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 80%. When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to 50%, consumes HP equal to 5% of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.

672810.name: Candelagraph Inspector
672810.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, for each 10 Energy consumed, increases ATK by 4% and Effect Hit Rate by 2%. This effect can stack up to 20 times, lasting for 2 turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least 80 Energy.

672840.name: Penman
672840.desc: After a character attacks and deals Ultimate DMG, for every enemy target hit, deals Ultimate DMG equal to 100% of the character's ATK to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.

672850.name: Star-Picker
672850.desc: When characters use Ultimate, gains 3 stack(s) of Grit and increases SPD by 25% and ATK by 20%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

672860.name: Repairman
672860.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 60%. After triggering a Follow-up ATK, every enemy target hit by the attack will make the next Ultimate ignore 5% of the enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to 5 time(s).

672870.name: Kolchis
672870.desc: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by a character, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by 65%, up to a max increase of 130% and lasting until after using their Ultimate.

673140.name: Oathkeeper
673140.desc: After turn 12 (counted as the cumulative number of turns taken by all allies) ends, action advances the first character in the current team and their memosprite by 100%. For the next 1 turn(s), grant them an extra turn at the end of the turn. After using an attack in this extra turn, deals Additional DMG equal to 600% of the attacker's ATK to the attacked target. Every stack of "Obsession" allies possess increases this DMG multiplier by 1% of the original multiplier.

673150.name: Elegy Priest
673150.desc: "Flower of Annihilation" appears in the Action Order: Records "Blazar" obtained by allies. When it takes action, deals Fire DMG equal to 5000% of the recorded value plus 3000% base DMG to all enemy targets, then clears the record. Increases its SPD by 1% for each "Obsession" stack that allies possess. When any ally target enters battle or is downed, or when any memosprite is summoned or disappears, Charges "Blazar" equal to 25% of Max HP for all ally targets.

673210.name: Growth-Ring Carver
673210.desc: When enemy targets become afflicted with Freeze or DoT status, there is a 150% base chance to Blast this effect to adjacent units. These effects are Blasted back to the original unit when no adjacent units are present. The same effect can only be Blasted 1 time per target per action. When one enemy target has Blasted effects a total of 12 times or when defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to 2500% base DMG to that target and adjacent targets. Every stack of "Obsession" allies possess increases this DMG by 1%.

673250.name: Nether Longship
673250.desc: When enemy target receives "Blazar" DMG, "Murmur" stacks in possession obtains Charge equal to 10% of this instance of DMG. This cannot exceed 5% of the clearance threshold. For every 20% of the clearance threshold "Murmur" Charges, the enemy target immediately takes 1 instance of Lightning DoT DMG equal to 400% of the "Murmur" clearance threshold. Each enemy target can trigger this up to 3 time(s), and the trigger count resets after any unit's action. This DMG is "Murmur" DMG and cannot defeat the enemy target.

673280.name: Whispering Woods
673280.desc: After ally targets use Ultimates 5 time(s) in total, "Murmur" deals DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG multiplier to adjacent targets. DMG dealt by "Murmur" then additionally increases by 2% every time an Ultimate is used.

673420.name: Gray River's Representative
673420.desc: After every 9 stack(s) of "Critical Boost" obtained by all allies or after defeating any enemy target, fires 10 Lux Arrow(s) to attack random enemy targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to 350% base DMG. Each Lux Arrow will cause "Murmur" to deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG, and cause "Murmur" to gain Charge equal to 20% of the total sum of ally characters' ATK.

673470.name: Beastkin
673470.desc: When no enemy targets on field have "Beast Tongue," "Beast Tongue" is applied to random attacked target after ally targets use an attack. After enemies with "Beast Tongue" receive a total of 8 attack(s) or are defeated, they take Lightning DMG equal to 4000% base DMG, adjacent targets take DMG equal to 3000% base DMG, and all allies increase CRIT DMG by 60% and SPD by 20% for 2 turn(s). If in the "Butterfly Soul" state, then it is considered to additionally launching 1 attack(s).

673480.name: Winged Tiger
673480.desc: After ally targets use an attack, apply "Fearful Tremble" equal to their "Critical Boost" stack to an attacked target with the highest "Fearful Tremble" stacks. Every stack of "Fearful Tremble" reduces enemy targets' DMG dealt by 0.5%. When reaching 50 stack(s), it deals Wind DMG equal to 3500% of base DMG and loses 20 stack(s), then increases the enemy's CRIT DMG taken by 150% for 3 turn(s). When the enemy target takes action, they obtain all "Fearful Tremble" on the field. When they are defeated, "Fearful Tremble" will be applied to the enemy target with the highest current stacks.

673510.name: Berserker
673510.desc: After any ally unit is attacked, it is considered as all ally targets have been attacked. All ally targets will Charge "Blazar" equal to 8% of their respective Max HP.

673560.name: Conflict Author
673560.desc: When the total HP lost by ally targets is equal to 100% of their Max HP or after recovering from being downed, deals "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 350% of their Max HP to all enemies. When a character's turn starts, consumes HP equal to 5% of Max HP, increasing this value by 5% after every time this effect is triggered. When ally characters become downed for the first time in this battle, restore their current HP to 100% of their Max HP, and HP will no longer be consumed when their turn starts.

673580.name: Sky Priest
673580.desc: After ally targets are attacked, gain 2 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." After they unleash a Counter, gain 1 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." When they have 6 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)," "Lightning Sacrifice" is cleared to increase Ultimate DMG dealt by 180% for 2 turn(s) and deals 200% "Blazar" DMG to all enemy targets. This damage is considered as Ultimate DMG.

673640.name: Wounds of Plenty
673640.desc: "Maddening Voice" appears in the Action Order: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, advances their action by 5%. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the current team by 100%. After that unit uses an attack, deals 10 instances(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 30% of the ally target's ATK, and up to 4 instances of attacks can take effect. Moreover, all ally targets' "Aftertaste" DMG dealt multiplier increases by 100% of the original multiplier, and a countdown with 150 SPD will appear in the Action Order. Effects will last until the countdown's turn begins.

673670.name: Jolly Bandit
673670.desc: For every 1 consumed or overflowing Skill point of ally targets, obtain 1 prize draw chance, up to 25 time(s). When entering the "Butterfly Soul" state, summons "Lottery Machine" and consumes all prize draw chances to obtain prizes, with a base draw of 5 time(s). There is a small chance of obtaining the Special Prize, which deals 1 instance of DMG of a random Type equal to 4000% of base DMG to all enemy targets and increases the "Aftertaste" DMG multiplier dealt by all allies by 35% of the original multiplier. This effect can be stacked and lasts until the ally exits "Butterfly Soul". The Consolation Prize deals 1 instance of DMG of a random Type equal to 500% of base DMG to random enemy targets.

673690.name: Tearless Garden
673690.desc: After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, ignore Weakness Type to additionally reduce 10.0 Toughness. When ally targets Break enemy target Weakness, deals 2 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 150% ATK to all enemy targets. Every point of Max Toughness the enemy target has increases this DMG multiplier by 1% of the original multiplier.

673710.name: Home of Odes
673710.desc: The Charge required for "Butterfly Soul" increases by 50%. After entering the "Butterfly Soul" state, all ally targets' actions advance by 50% and the DMG multiplier of the True DMG dealt by "Butterfly Soul" increases by 50% of the original multiplier, additionally increasing by 1% for every stack of "Obsession" possessed by all allies.

673790.name: Cocoon Dressmaker
673790.desc: When entering the "Butterfly Soul" state, inflict "Cocoon" to all enemy targets. They cannot take action in the next turn, are action delayed by 50% at the start of the turn, and take Physical DMG equal to 5000% base DMG. While allies are in the "Butterfly Soul" state, enemy targets will become afflicted with "Cocoon" again every 2 turn(s), and "Butterfly Soul" recovers 4 attack count(s) after the first time enemy targets become Weakness Broken.

673860.name: Theater Puppet Maker
673860.desc: After the team uses a total of 6 Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 130% of the attacker's ATK 3 time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The character in position 1 in the current team activates their Ultimate, Charges Brain in a Vat to 200%, and uses Ultimate 4 times before the status ends on them.

673870.name: Caprism
673870.desc: After all allies use their Ultimates a total of 2 time(s), deals 2 instances of Wind DMG equal to 600% base DMG to a random enemy target. This DMG will deal DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to adjacent units. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances by 1 in this battle and increases the Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 12%, to a maximum of 15 time(s).

673920.name: Lazy Fingerjoint
673920.desc: When an ally target breaks an enemy target's Weakness, afflict them with 20 stack(s) of "Harmonize." After attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, causes any DoT currently applied on it and "Harmonize" to immediately deal DMG equal to 24% of the original DMG.

673950.name: Flame-Chase Alliance
673950.desc: When enemy targets take Break DMG, they additionally take 3 instance(s) of DMG equal to 50% of "Harmonize" max limit, and charge all allies with "Blazar" equal to 25% of their respective Max HP. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn by enemy targets.

674140.name: History Investigator
674140.desc: After ally targets are attacked, increases all ally targets' SPD by 35% for 2 turn(s) and gains 2 stack(s) of "Critical Boost." "Critical Boost" will not be lost when memosprites are attacked.

674160.name: Brewer of Bitter Memories
674160.desc: Every stack of "Obsession" additionally increases all ally targets' ATK by 1.5%. After a character uses an attack, their memosprite's next attack is considered as a Follow-up ATK.

674170.name: Memorial Chrysalis
674170.desc: For each stack of "Obsession" ally target has, ally target's Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt increase by 6%. When an ally character departs from the field, is knocked down, or when an ally memosprite disappears, the character in position 1 in the current team obtains 50% of that ally's "Obsession" stacks and an equal amount of "Obsession" max limit. This additional stack limit will disappear after 2 turn(s).

674190.name: Hearth Clan
674190.desc: Increases max "Obsession" stacks of allies by 4, and increases Max HP by an additional 0.4% for each "Obsession" stack for all allies. When breaking an enemy's Weakness, all allies gain 3 "Obsession" stacks.

674240.name: Executor
674240.desc: DoTs taken by enemy targets can CRIT. The CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG is equal to 20% of all ally characters' total CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG, with CRIT DMG capped at 120%.

674260.name: One Buried At Sea
674260.desc: The clearing threshold of "Murmur" increases by 120%. After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, causes the "Murmur" on the attacked target to deal DMG equal to 20% of original DMG.

674280.name: Book-Burning Bureaucrat
674280.desc: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 160%. After using Ultimate, causes the "Murmur" on the attacked target to gain Charge equal to 10% of this instance of Ultimate DMG. This increase cannot exceed 300% of the total sum of ally characters' ATK.

674410.name: Archer of Recollections
674410.desc: Increases the maximum stack of "Critical Boost" by 4. Every stack of "Critical Boost" additionally increases SPD by 3% and additionally increases memosprite SPD by 2%.

674450.name: Orphaned Daggers
674450.desc: Increases "Critical Boost" max limit by 4 stack(s). For every 15% of total team Max HP lost by the entire team, the ally target acting next immediately receives 1 stack of "Critical Boost" at the start of the turn.

674460.name: Roaming Troupe
674460.desc: After any ally targets use an attack and deal CRIT DMG, deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to 1%~50% of the original DMG after attacking. If the attack was a Follow-up ATK, deals True DMG equal to 1%~70% of the original DMG instead.

674470.name: Fowl-Hunting Golden Claw
674470.desc: For every 1% of action advance effect gained by ally targets, increases DMG dealt in the next turn by 2%, up to a max of 100%. This effect additionally increases by 30% against targets in the "Butterfly Soul" state.

674510.name: Madness Malady
674510.desc: When an ally target is hit with an attack or consumes HP while their HP percentage is less than 40%, consumes 5 stack(s) of "Obsession" from the target with the highest "Obsession" stacks in the team, heals for 25% of this unit's Max HP, and increases DMG dealt by 150% for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per turn.

674520.name: Ominous Flamespirit
674520.desc: When ally targets deal "Blazar" DMG and if the enemy target is in any DoT state, the DMG multiplier of this instance of "Blazar" increases by 60% of the original multiplier. Every DoT type additionally increases this multiplier by 15%.

674570.name: Coronal Phoenix
674570.desc: Increases "Blazar" Charging Efficiency by 50%. When "Butterfly Soul" state is active, using Basic ATK/Skills to perform attacks deals 100% "Blazar" DMG to the target.

674590.name: Kremnos Vanguards
674590.desc: When ally targets Break any enemy target's Weakness, Charge "Blazar" equal to 25% of Max HP. If all enemy targets are Weakness Broken, "Blazar" will not be cleared at the start of ally targets' turns.

674620.name: Conspiracy Theorist
674620.desc: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, there is a 150% base chance to inflict 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for 2 turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by 15.0%, decrease DEF by 30.0%, and decrease SPD by 20.0%.

674650.name: Smiling Executioner
674650.desc: After any ally target uses an attack, if their HP percentage is greater than 60%, consume 5% Max HP and deals 1 instance of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 120% of their Max HP.

674680.name: Drunk Supervisor
674680.desc: Increase CRIT DMG dealt by ally targets' Follow-up ATKs by 150%. When using "Brain in a Vat" to launch Ultimate and deal DMG to enemy targets, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK.

674690.name: Performance Artist
674690.desc: For every time ally targets attack a Weakness Broken enemy target, this target takes 1 instance of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 300% of the attack's ATK when it recovers from being Weakness Broken.

674710.name: Memory Seed Cultivator
674710.desc: The True DMG multiplier of "Butterfly Soul" increases by 60% of the original multiplier and increases attack count by 4. After a memosprite uses an attack, they can trigger the True DMG of "Butterfly Soul" and consume its attack count.

674740.name: Wolfmother of the North
674740.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of ally targets' Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by 150%. While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, for every instance of attack used by an ally target, they immediately obtain 2% of Charge for "Soul Chrysalis" when they exit the "Butterfly Soul" state. Charge gained this way cannot exceed 40%.

674780.name: Book-Weaving Divine Machine
674780.desc: When ally target enters "Butterfly Soul" state, used Ultimate also deals "Butterfly Soul"'s True DMG, and increases "Butterfly Soul"'s attack count by 2. This effect triggers up to 1 time for each ally.

674790.name: Orphan Carehouse
674790.desc: After breaking an enemy target's Weakness, recovers 1 Skill Points. Using Basic ATK and Skills to attack enemy targets inflicts 5 additional Toughness Reduction and applies 2 "Harmonize" stacks.

674810.name: Erythrokeramism
674810.desc: After a memosprite uses an attack, Charge their memomaster's "Brain in a Vat" by 8%. After the memomaster uses "Brain in a Vat" to use their Ultimate, increases the memosprite's DMG by 240% for 4 turn(s).

674820.name: Giant Wise Tree
674820.desc: Ally targets' ATK increases by 100%. After using ATKs that deal Ultimate DMG, causes the "Murmur" on the attacked target to deal DMG equal to 200% of original DMG.

674840.name: Warring Scholar
674840.desc: When any ally target Breaks any enemy target's Weakness, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 20% and regenerates Energy equal to 10% of Max Energy. After defeating any enemy target, regenerates Energy equal to 60% of Max Energy.

674850.name: Forbidden Knowledge's Martyr
674850.desc: When any ally target uses their Ultimate, consumes HP from all ally targets equal to 5% of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by 30% to a max of 4 stack(s), lasting for 2 turn(s).

674920.name: Wilting Patient
674920.desc: When enemy targets take "Harmonize" DMG, additionally take 1 instance of "Harmonize" DMG equal to 75% of the original DMG. Every debuff currently on the target additionally increases this DMG by 2%, up to a max of 40%.

674950.name: Sym-Thanatos
674950.desc: Increases ally target's Break Effect by 100%. When using attacks to Break enemy targets' Weaknesses, gain a shield that can offset DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP that lasts 5 turn(s). Also additionally deals 300% of "Blazar" DMG to the current target after an attack.

674970.name: Society of Charity
674970.desc: After any ally target attacks a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction of this attack into 1 instance of 100% Super Break DMG. While in the "Butterfly Soul" state, this effect additionally deals 100% Super Break DMG.

675140.name: Judge of the Nightveil
675140.desc: When a memosprite disappears, increases all ally targets' SPD by 25% and CRIT DMG by 100% for 5 turn(s).

675160.name: Joyspring Fount
675160.desc: Every stack of "Obsession" on the ally team increases Follow-up ATK DMG and Additional DMG received by enemy targets by 0.3%. After enemy targets receive DMG from summons, this effect further increases by 0.2%, lasting for 1 turn.

675170.name: Life-Giving Sculptor
675170.desc: Increases DMG dealt by memosprites by 80%. After a memosprite uses an attack, the DMG dealt by the memomaster's next Basic ATK/Skill increases by 80%.

675180.name: Bard
675180.desc: While allies' "Obsession" stacks exceed 70, increases Ultimate DMG by 75% and memosprite DMG by 75%.

675190.name: Priest of Time
675190.desc: While ally targets possess "Obsession" increases All-Type RES PEN by 15%. Every "Obsession" stack increases all ally targets' Break Effect by 0.5%.

675210.name: Passenger of River of Souls
675210.desc: Increases DoT dealt by ally targets by 50%. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with "Observed." At the start of the turn, they take Fire DoT equal to 75% base DMG. This DMG increases by 1% for every stack of "Obsession" possessed by all ally targets.

675240.name: Black Tide's Decrepit Bow
675240.desc: Ally targets' ATK increases by 30%. After all allies end a total of 5 turns, causes the DMG dealt by "Murmur" to increase by 50%.

675250.name: Grim Pilgrim
675250.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to 10% of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed 200% of all ally targets' total HP.

675270.name: Bone Planter
675270.desc: The clearing threshold of "Murmur" increases by 80%. After consuming Skill Point(s), Charge "Murmur" for all enemies by 4% of the clearing threshold.

675280.name: Society of Disappointment
675280.desc: When any enemy targets are defeated, regenerates 5.0 Energy for all allies for every Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear states they possess.

675420.name: Law's Arbitrators
675420.desc: For every "Murmur" Charge that equals to 1% of the clearing threshold, increases CRIT DMG taken by enemy targets by 1.0%, up to a max of 150%.

675450.name: Kremnos Traveler
675450.desc: Increases Shield Effect gained by ally targets by 30%. After ally targets are attacked and if they did not take DMG in this attack, they will only lose 1 stack(s) of "Critical Boost."

675480.name: Hunter of Monstrous Beasts
675480.desc: Increase CRIT DMG by 8% for each stack of "Critical Boost." When an ally target uses their Ultimate, inherit this max stack number and receive 2 stack(s) of "Critical Boost."

675490.name: Cleaner
675490.desc: When any ally target deals DMG to a Weakness Broken enemy target, each stack of "Critical Boost" additionally increases CRIT Rate by 4% and CRIT DMG by 30%.

675510.name: War Scribes
675510.desc: Ally targets' Max HP increases by 40%. When entering battle or summoning memosprite, charges "Blazar" equal to 100% of each unit's Max HP. Then, when the next turn begins, "Blazar" is not depleted.

675520.name: Fang of Dying Sun
675520.desc: Increases all ally targets' Effect RES by 20% and "Blazar" DMG dealt by 40%. When resisting debuffs, deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of "Blazar" to the target. This DMG cannot defeat enemy targets.

675540.name: Foolish Child of Golden Blood
675540.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of "Blazar" by 18% up to a maximum of 3 stack(s). Also, restores HP for all allies equal to 30% of their respective Max HP.

675560.name: Red Moon's Messenger
675560.desc: Increases "Blazar" Base Value by 50%. After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, the ally target with the lowest current HP percentage restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.

675590.name: Skyblade's Legion
675590.desc: Increases Shield Effect gained by 30%. After Breaking an enemy target's Weakness, all allies obtain a Shield equal to 15% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s).

675620.name: Send-Off Carnival
675620.desc: For every type of debuff an enemy target is afflicted with, the Follow-up ATK DMG they receive increases by 6%, up to a max of 60%.

675650.name: Water Lyrist
675650.desc: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, deals 70% of "Blazar" DMG to the attacked targets.

675670.name: Wave-Chasing Siren
675670.desc: Increases the Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by ally targets by 75%. After launching a Follow-up ATK, there is a 30% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

675680.name: Sophist of Gods
675680.desc: After an ally uses an Ultimate, when using the next attack, deals "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 240% ATK 1 time(s) to the target.

675690.name: Boat of Intoxication
675690.desc: "Aftertaste" DMG dealt by ally targets can ignore Weakness Type and reduce 1.0 Toughness from enemy targets. In a single attack, this effect can be triggered against each enemy target up to 10 time(s). This effect is not active in the enemy target's turn.

675710.name: Creation Nymph
675710.desc: After a memosprite attacks, "Soul Chrysalis" Charges for 15% with a 40% chance to recover 1 Skill Point(s).

675720.name: Boulder Court
675720.desc: Increases the True DMG multiplier of "Butterfly Soul" by 35% of the original multiplier. Every debuff on the enemy target additionally increases this by 1% of the original multiplier.

675750.name: Golden Mysteries
675750.desc: Increases Basic ATK/Skill DMG dealt by ally targets' by 80%. When an ally uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is higher than or equal to 50%, consumes HP equal to 10% of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.

675760.name: Thief Musician
675760.desc: For every Skill Point used by an ally target, the next attack applies "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 70% ATK to the target, stacking up to 3 time(s).

675790.name: Radiant Jellyfish
675790.desc: Ally targets' Basic ATK DMG and Skill DMG ignore 25% of the enemy target's DEF. This effect increases to 40% on enemy targets in the Weakness Broken state.

675810.name: Sand Scribe
675810.desc: When characters use Ultimate, gains 2 stack(s) of "Obsession" for themselves and their memosprite, increases SPD by 15%, and increases ATK by 70%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

675840.name: Child of Spiral
675840.desc: When an ally target's "Brain in a Vat" reaches 100%, increases their ATK by 80%. After using an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 80% of ATK to the enemy target with the highest HP among the targets attacked, lasting for 3 turn(s).

675860.name: Lotophagism
675860.desc: When ally targets use their Ultimate, for each 50 Energy consumed, increases ATK by 5% and increases the DMG multiplier of "Aftertaste" dealt by 2% of the original multiplier. This effect can stack up to 20 times, lasting for 3 turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least 80 Energy.

675870.name: White Dryad
675870.desc: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by an ally target, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by 65%, up to a max increase of 130% and lasting until after using their Ultimate.

675890.name: Nodist School
675890.desc: When ally characters use Ultimate to attack, CRIT DMG dealt increases by 60%, and the attack ignores Weakness Types to additionally reduce 5 Toughness.

675910.name: Court of Echoes
675910.desc: Every stack of "Obsession" increases Break Effect by 0.8%. Memosprite's Break Effect additionally increases by 0.5%.

675920.name: Disoriented Hermit
675920.desc: When any ally target used an attack to inflict a debuff on enemy targets, apply 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize" to the enemy targets. If the targets are Weakness Broken, the applied stacks are doubled.

675940.name: Flame-Chase Envoy
675940.desc: Increases ally targets' Weakness Break Efficiency by 20%. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD by 10% and ATK by 30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

675960.name: Dawn Troupe
675960.desc: Increases the DMG multiplier of "Harmonize" by 50%. After ally targets launch a Follow-up ATK, apply 1 stack(s) of "Harmonize" to attacked targets.
